review_text: Cute cottage cabin tiny living on expansive property. Dog friendly!!!!! Pond has crystal clear water! Fire pit was amazing! Near by to busy town with everything one could need.
We had such a good week here. The grounds are extraordinary and the pond is so clean and clear. The cottage was so clean and comfortable. Lots to see in the area. Debbie was a great host.

Debbie’s place is absolutely magical. My husband, pup and I had the loveliest stay here and would definitely book again in the future! The property is beautiful, peaceful and private and Debbie was so welcoming and accommodating.

We truly enjoyed staying in the lovely, clean, and cozy cottage on Debbie’s beautiful, spacious property. The location was excellent for exploring a variety of towns and beaches on the cape, as well as ferrying to Nantucket. The kayaks, canoe, and paddle board were great to use on the large, serene pond. It was fun to have a balance throughout the week between exploring the area and relaxing while enjoying the gorgeous property. Thank you, Debbie.
Debbie’s cottage was a dream: beautiful, quiet and comfortable. Location is great near beaches shop and restaurants and the lake was a GREAT plus. we’ll definitely go back!
Was perfect place to stay with my mom and 6 year old son. Beautiful peaceful yard.
Debbie is an excellent host! Cottage was wonderful!

Our recent stay was a great getaway from start to finish. Debbie responded quickly, check in was easy, and there was even a welcome wine when we got there. The property is just as described, and we appreciated the flexibility to use the lake or drive to the beach. When we accidentally left a charger, Debbie even mailed it back to us. We highly recommend it to anyone seeking a comfortable and enjoyable stay.
Debbie was a responsive host. Property sits on beautiful surroundings and near pond. Convenient but private location on Cape Cod. Thank you Debbie.

Debbie’s place was great for our family. We really enjoyed hanging around the house/yard, very peaceful! And as other reviews mentioned great proximity to so many other places to explore on the Cape. Would highly recommend!

Wow, the property is beautiful! There is a lake, and the hostess provides nonmotorized water equipment. The cottage is small, but it is the perfect size for two people. It is tastefully decorated and super clean. Debbie is a great hostess, very lovely and friendly. I highly recommend this listing.
Beautiful place. Generous hostess.
This is a little gem! Just the perfect size for a couple and the location is awesome - convenient to beaches, shopping and of course Ice Cream!!

We had the pleasure of celebrating our 44th anniversary in this beautiful little cottage! The grounds were gorgeous and so well kept. The little lake was so relaxing to sit by and read a book!
We spent almost two weeks there and enjoyed every minute of it. Boston and Plymouth were close enough to drive there, and back to the cottage the same day, which was perfect after a day of sightseeing!
The cottage had everything we needed, the bed was importantly comfortable, and there was even a very comfortable recliner for my husband to sit back relax and watch TV. He felt like he was at home.
Debbie was a great hostess, she was there in the background if we needed her and willing to send over information when we inquired about traffic, sightseeing and grocery shopping!
We hope to make this a yearly thing!

Amazingly cute cottage on a very nice property in great location. Central to so many towns on the cape and you even have your own pond access. Very private and secluded with own driveway but close to Hyannis, shopping and dining.
Debbie is an amazing hostess and very communicative. We were able to store our bikes in the barn for when it rained. Even though it says no WiFi access she shared the main house connection with us and it was strong enough for me to work remotely from inside the cabin. Very clean with nice sized bathroom and bedroom. Mini fridge but great oven and kitchen equipment for cooking.
One thing to note is to keep the windows sealed. When we didn’t have them shut on top a lot of flies got in. There’s ac in the bedroom so not a huge issue.
Thanks for a great stay!

The description for Debbie's cottage is accurate. Although it looks & feels secluded down a country lane, it's not far from shopping & restaurants and easy access to both Rtes 6 & 6A. It was a bit cool for us to take advantage of the adjacent lake, but kayaks and a canoe are available. The property is large, so perfect for a dog (or puppy) to run off their excess energy. Drive south to reach Falmouth & Woods Hole for ferries to both Martha's Vinyard and Nantucket. We enjoyed the location and the neigh or we met.

Debbie was a fantastic host, she took care of every detail to make our vacation perfect. The cottage was beautiful and very clean, she had everything that we could possibly need. We brought our fur baby golden retriever and Debbie had a dog bowel and treats for her., that was such a special touch. The property was gorgeous with plenty to do. It was my first time to Cape Cod and I’m already looking forward to returning .

Absolutely loved this little place. The property is well maintained and beautiful. The lake is a great feature too! Everything you need for 2 people to enjoy their stay. The privacy here is a bonus as well as the location to near restaurants and attractions!

A very charming and cozy cottage. Huge bedroom. The grounds were awesome and we spent part of our last day kayaking around the lake. Great location for going to all parts of the cape. I highly recommend renting bikes in Dennis and biking the rail trail up to Orleans. One of my favorite parts of the trip.
I highly recommend.! Not too far of a drive into Hyannis to shop at Trader Joe’s also!
Perfect week!

This cottage is so cozy and lovely and the grounds are gorgeous. The host is right next door, very responsive and helpful. I love all the sweet touches and being near the pond. The swimming and kayaking are so great and the small private beach so nice for relaxing. The location is great for exploring all parts of the Cape.

Adorable cottage on an incredible property. The pond is beautiful and we got to row around once but we were too busy exploring the cape everyday. Central location to anywhere on the cape. Debbie was a great host, good communication and very thoughtful. If you wanted to just relax, you wouldn’t even need to leave this property.

Adorable cottage and beautiful grounds for a nice relaxing stay. The location is great, quiet, but close to so many things on the Cape. Pictures and description are accurate, Debbie is friendly and helpful, would highly recommend!!

We had a wonderful time staying at Debbie’s cottage. She thought of everything a guest might need to have on hand during their stay. The property is beautiful and it is wonderful to be able to enjoy kayaking and swimming in the pond as well as be a short drive to multiple beaches. The nearby village is also lovely with wonderful restaurants and art galleries. Thanks so much for hosting us Debbie!

DEBBIE WAS AN OUTSTANDING HOSTESS. THE COTTAGE HAD EVERYTHING WE NEEDED AND MORE. SHE ATTENDED TO EVERY LAST DETAIL PERFECTLY. THE COTTAGE WAS DECORATED ADORABLY AND WAS IMMACULATE. WOULD NOT HESITATE TO STAY AGAIN.
Second time staying. Very comfortable. Lovely grounds and pond to kayak in. Convenient location. Recommend

This cottage is a wonderful and the property is just amazing. So much to do, you really don't need to leave. But, if you do the proximity to everything is GREAT. A short drive to the beach and you can hit ever town on the cape in just under hour. What a special place. Debbie was a great host and the cottage is well a pointed. Look forward to going back!!
A/C could use an upgrade.......very noisy. Otherwise a 5 star thumbs up!

Debbie’s Cape Cod Cottage is indeed adorable, very comfortable in a beautiful, picturesque setting. The cottage was clean, well supplied and in a great location to explore the Cape. Debbie was quick to respond and very accommodating. We would definitely stay again.
Great place! Comfortable, pretty grounds, well stocked, great value!

This is our second time at Debbie's place. She's made some renovations which only enhance its charm. Our dog absolutely loves it too! Debbie is always available for suggestions on where to eat or things to do or to answer any questions you might have. We'd absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for any couple looking for a private, quiet place to stay on the Cape.
Lovely cottage with all the amenities, beautiful property, and a wonderful host! Highly recommend.

Barnstable is one of the most picturesque, appealing towns in Massachusetts, and Debbie's guest house may well be the most appealing public lodging in the town. The house has the charm of a building over 200 years old, but it is also up to date for both comfort and style. It is set on beautiful, spacious property which includes a lake for kayaking or swimming. It even has good fishing! You simply couldn't ask for a cooler, more gracious spot as a headquarters for exploring the Cape generally, or just relaxing in beautiful Barnstable.

This well maintained cabin with artistic touches was just what we were looking for in the way of a vacation. The large stone on the front lawn facing the street says "Serenity" and that was exactly what we found.
Debbie was accessible and answered our questions right away. She was gracious in sharing all the fabulous amenities of their several acres in the back, with a sliding swing, hammock, picnic table, canoe/kayak launch (life vests and paddles) and the whimsy art placed around the beautifully landscaped yard was great for an evening stroll.
Parking is at the front door with a key pad entrance. All the furnishing, curtains and towels, etc were charming and new. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and hope to return many times in the future.
There was easy access to main roads leading to Route 6 and the city of Hyannis with all it's shopping possibilities. Also, we found an entrance to a conservation area with hiking trails on a morning walk down the narrow country lane to the left out of the entrance, which was an added bonus for us.
Such a darling little cottage in a postcard location. Felt totally private and secluded, with old cape cod charm.

Wonderful spot on beautiful grounds. The pond was a fantastic option for swimming, kayaking, fishing (it was our dog's favorite thing). The cottage is small but provides all you need and Debbie is a great host. We'd definitely go back.

We had such a wonderful, relaxing time at Debbie's little cottage! The accommodations were simple but plenty of space for us. The ground were incredible especially if you're bringing any canine family members - the private yard feels like a park, and the spring-fed pond is beautiful and clean. Our dog loved swimming. Extremely convenient to 6A and the small towns and businesses along the way, while still feeling very remote and quiet. Debbie's cottage is the perfect way to stay on the Cape for a few days without feeling like you're in the middle of the beach hubbub.

Excellent stay. Very comfortable cozy space on a great property. Kayaks were fun on the pond. Kitchen limited equipment but great for breakfast and lunch. Would definitely return. Beautiful area and grounds. Host was very helpful and communicative. Posted back earrings left behind. Highly recommended.

Debbie's cottage is in an idyllic spot, beautifully decorated and in lovely grounds which my puppy loved exploring. It has every amenity you would need. Debbie was an attentive host and when I had a small issue in the bathroom was quick to get is resolved and follow up to make sure all was working well. I hope we can come back again soon. It's the perfect base to explore the Cape.

Debbie's guest house is a wonderful and cozy place filled with thoughtful touches. The place itself felt quite spacious (at least to us city-dwellers) for a family of three plus a small dog, and we greatly enjoyed taking advantage of the peaceful yard, the hammock, and the pond. We would love to stay again some time and would recommend without reservation to friends.

Debbie was very responsive and had great recommendations. The cottage was very clean with a nice and thoughtful touch to it. The location made it very convenient to get everywhere. Definitely recommend this if you’re looking for a place to stay on the cape!

Had a great stay at Debbie's place! It was the perfect little cottage for our trip to the Cape, central to everything and easy to access. We loved the pond that was accessible from the property and went swimming there most days. Highly recommend!

The cottage is absolutely adorable! It was the perfect combination of peace and tranquillity and yet close enough to everything to stay busy all day long. Debbie is the perfect host and we suggest if you're looking for the above mentioned then Debbie's little cottage in West Barnstable is the place to go. We will definitely stay there again when we go back to the cape.

Lovely, lovely cottage on an incredible piece of property. We loved the spot especially the huge lawn and access to the lake and my dog had a blast. Debbie is extremely friendly and accommodating. Highly recommend!

Very tranquil place to relax and enjoy. Afetr arriving at the cottage we realized that we stayed at te Best Western 4 years prior, We are so happy to have rented this cottage for our stay. it was everything that we expected. People were so friendly.
I cannot say enough great things about our stay; awesome host, awesome location, awesome cottage and the list goes on. We are looking forward to staying again sometime.

This cottage is really lovely, charming and comfortable with interesting antiques and everything you need. Swimming and kayaking on the pond with bald eagles and turtles to watch are a real treat. Quiet and peaceful, this is a great location from which to explore the Cape. Debbie was very helpful with everything I needed. The grounds and her beautiful flowers are really spectacular too. I can't wait to return!

This was the perfect place for our visit to Cape Cod. The cottage was cozy and comfortable- it had everything we needed. Great location and the setting was awesome. During our stay we had a few questions and Debbie`s responses were immediate. Would definitely stay there again if we return to Cape Cod
If you are looking for peace and quiet, this is your place. What you see is what you get. No surprises. Great location and a wonderful host.

What a wonderful experience!
This guest house is more than we expected... 100% historic cape cod with fantastic lodging, land, water, tranquility and all the comforts one needs to have a memorable time..
Debbie is great!! She provided us with answers and advice to my many “pre-trip” emails, which resulted in a fabulous time from P-Town to Nantucket and most everything in between...
Thanks again Debbie!!!
Hey Debbie - We will return, and next time we will absolutely go to the Vineyard ;)

Great little cottage on a picturesque piece of property.
A Perfect hub for a couple and our little dog, Zorro. We were able to explore Cape Cod and Rhode Island and come back to the cottage for down time and rest in a comfy bed. Nice kitchenette and little living room to start off and wrap up the day.
Beautiful acreage with lake access. We enjoyed waking down Plum street and September gave us lovely weather to enjoy.
Debbie has her home and cottage decorated for fall so it was fun for us Florida travellers to get an early taste.
Debbie was a great host. I hope to stay again at the adorable cottage. It was even better than I imagined. Just perfect!

This is my 2nd time staying at Debbie's. I love how peaceful & charming the cottage is. Plus my pets love to stay here too! Had a great weekend!
Thank you Debbie.

I would strongly recommend this adorable cottage and property!! The cottage was perfect and Debbie was warm and friendly. I wished we had been able to get to know each other a bit better. I loved everything about the visit and my time in the cottage. the property and cottage is 100% CAPE COD! See you next year Debbie! KW

Debbies cottage is lovely! I was traveling with my daughter and grandaughter, and all three generations equally loved this place. All the essentials were provided plus unexpected touches and treats. The cottage is in a peaceful, picturesque setting, and neighborhood, with beatuful gardens and local architecture. We enjoyed kayaking, paddle boarding and swimming in the pond every morning before heading out to explore the cape. (the pond is closer to a 30-40 acre lake that is crystal clear, and warm as bathwater). Barnstable is a great starting point on the cape and in close proximity to many beaches and points of interest. We would have loved to spend more time here and would definitely return. Debbie is a wonderful host. We made great memories on this trip.

What a little slice of heaven! We had such a wonderful stay at Debbie's. She was such a welcoming & friendly host. A great location, great time!
Thank you Debbie for hosting all of us!!

Pam is a fantastic hostess! She made us homemade muffins, got us ice cream, and stocked the fridge with drinks and snacks. She even left treats for our dog. The place is very dog friendly and her backyard is beautifully landscaped! Her place is close to many beaches and the main center of Hyannis. Highly recommend!

A great visit and Pam was a great host. We felt very welcome from the moment we arrived. Sophie the dog) felt very welcome as well. This house is stocked with almost anything you might need, Including maps and guide books to the area. Highly recommend!

Pam and her place exceeded our expectations in every way. Whatever you forget, she probably has it. Breakfast is not just a muffin. There was eggs in the fridge, granola, cereal, snacks, candy, dog treats, your favorite ice cream and all kinds of toppers, drinks, condiments... need I say more?! It was like our home away from home. We have an anxious dog and before we knew it, she was navigating the doggie door, bringing her toys in the bathroom so she could lie on the plush rugs lol, and finding a patch of sunshine to lie in. The yard and gardens and lit pathways are beautiful. We hope to come again sometime, if we can find an opening!

Our stay was absolutely WONDERFUL. Pam is an amazing host that truly goes above and beyond to make her guests’ stay perfect. As a couple with a neurotic dog that has to travel with us, we have stayed a lot of places that allow dogs, but this is the first truly dog friendly rental. The fenced in yard is beautiful, and secure. The doggy dog allowed our dog to enter and exit as he wanted which he loved. The space was cozy and felt like home. Pam has thought of everything, and we would 100% recommend her place to anyone traveling with their dog!

Pam was wonderful! Her place was spotless, well stocked, and she was very welcoming to my family and especially to my dogs! The best part was the gorgeous fenced in yard, so perfect for the dogs to hang out. We can’t wait to stay again !

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Pam goes above and beyond for her guests human and dog alike. The BNB was comfortable, clean, and had everything you could need. We loved how much she loved accommodating our pup. She gave great recommendations and the location was perfect for us. We will definitely be returning in the future!

Pam’s wonderful apartment felt like a true home with dogs and all! Everything in the kitchen was labeled and wonderfully organized. She truly paid attention to every detail. The wife and I had a beautiful experience. Pam is wonderful and her dogs are all happy and nice. I can’t recommend this place enough. Best AirBnB we’ve ever been to!

I can’t say enough about this stay. Let me start off by saying the place was immaculate !!! Pam was very friendly and welcoming. I felt like I was living in my own home. Pam had absolutely everything that you would need in that home from snacks to toiletries ect… She had our favorite kind of ice cream waiting for us when we got there and amazing homemade blueberry muffins for the morning. She also had dog treats and toys for the dogs. I give this place 10 stars !!! Thank you Pam !!!

I am so glad we found this gem of an airbnb. My partner and I brought our dog and it was our first time vacationing with our dog. Pam's place is absolutely perfect for dogs, with a fenced in back yard, quiet neighborhood for walks, and Pam preparing so well for our visit. The apartment itself was clean, well stocked, and comfortable enough to want to spend time in. Pam is a kind and thoughtful host, we will definitely be back!

I can’t say enough about this space. Pam was so wonderful and she has left nothing out in terms of having all of the comforts of home accessible. I have never stayed at an Airbnb with all of the comforts that Pam’s place has. I highly recommend it as does my dog Luna

We had such a wonderful time at Pam's place with our dog, Daisy! Pam is a kind, thoughtful, and responsive host, and she went above and beyond to make sure we all had a great trip. The place was cute and clean and was a great home base for us as we explored Cape Cod. We would definitely stay here again and 100% recommend to others!

Pam is amazing friendly warm and welcoming. She thought of everything down to the two local beers, local goodies like Ice cream and yummy home made muffins. If you forgot something it is prob there my wife forgot a tooth brush and there was extras in the bathroom which was nice. She gave us good food places in the area and which were her fav. Thank you we will be looking her up next time we’re in the cape.

My pup and I had a wonderful stay at Pam’s place! She greeted us upon arrival and gave me a tour of the space. Everything is super clean, organized, and labeled. The couch and bed were super comfortable, I slept like a log! Pam’s pups were very friendly to my little guy and he enjoyed the yard. It’s very close to the beach, cute coffee shops, restaurants, and anything else you might need. It was the perfect place for my little getaway and I will 100% be booking again!

Pam’s place is super. Great value for what you get. We went there because it was dog friendly. It is so dog friendly. Our boy got to play with other dogs and Pam babysat while we were out - giving us total piece of mind. We will definitely return. This is the kind of place you leaving planning to add Pam to your Christmas card list with pictures of the dog!!

Staying with Pam was like staying with a friend, she was welcoming to my dog and me, provided a stocked fridge including ice cream after checking on my preferences, the dog yard was clean and fun, I think my dog enjoyed walking around at night and having the motion sensor lights come on. Everything was comfortable and clean , wish I could have stayed longer.

We just spent 2 nights at Pam's and had a wonderful time. Pam is very friendly, happy to chat and give information but is not intrusive and did not bother us when we needed privacy. The place is very dog (and people!) friendly, and we wished we had found it years ago!
The kitchen was stocked with everything you need for cooking. Beach chairs and equipment looked great, but as we stayed in February, we did not use any of it. Our dog was happy to run around in the fenced yard.
We will be back :)
Fantastic host and great space

Pam was very welcoming and hospitable, even leaving home-baked muffins for my arrival. Her attention to the needs of my dog, monkey were also front and center. Her description of it being a dog-friendly stay were spot on, too. 100% would stay there again!

We spent an extraordinary week with Pam. It began with her greeting us (my dogs and me) right when we pulled up. We chatted easily as if we were old friends. She gave me a tour of the unit, described what I needed to know, and then left us be.
The most important thing to know is that Pam’s place feels like home. There are books, pictures, wall hangings. It exudes warmth and comfort, and within an hour, you feel like you’ve lived there forever. I cannot remember a more thoughtful host. There is nothing she has not considered, and everything is right there for you. The fenced backyard was perfect for Samwise and Emily and allowed me to rest assured they were always safe.
Something that hit me that makes this rental stand out from any place I’ve been is the number of lamps! It makes every room, and I mean EVERY ROOM, feel cozy. ( There’s overhead lighting if you want it, but why would you (other than to clean?)
I know we’ll be back because I feel like we made a friend on Cape Cod.
Comfortable and quiet little spot in a very convenient location for getting around the Cape. Pam is lovely and so concerned for her guests’ comfort - the pups and I had a great stay.

As owners of 2 labs, we were looking for a place with a nice fenced yard. Pam’s home was perfect. The dogs had a blast. The rental was very clean, comfortable, and it had everything we needed. Pam was a gracious host and very knowledgeable about the area. We’ll be back!

We can't say how Fabulous this place is!!! and How Great Pam is...
Been staying at Airbnb for 11 yrs.. this was the BEST we've ever been too!!!
She thought of EVERYTHING! for US and our DOG!!
DEFINITELY going BACK!!

Our stay at Pam's place exceeded our expectations. The appartment is super clean, cozy and comfortable. Pam has thought of every possible need for visitors and labelled everything so it is easy to find. There were delicious muffins and ice cream waiting for us in the well equipped kitchen when we arrived and Pam then made gluten and dairy free (!) brownies for my husband's birthday. Also the shower has amazing water pressure!
For dogs (and their owners) it is heaven. The fenced backyard is safe and gorgeous and the home has everything you could need for your dog - bowls, toys, towels, crate if needed. There was a little welcome sign with our dog's name and Pam even watched our dog while we spent an afternoon at the beach! Many places describe themselves as "dog friendly" but we've never experienced a place that made traveling with a dog feel so relaxing and truly welcoming. Thank you, Pam, for being such a kind, friendly and thoughtful host.

Pam and her husband are truly wonderful airbnb hosts. They make you feel like family staying in a family home yet provide you with the privacy you need. Their fenced in properly, split just for guests dogs, is heavenly. My dog is not lucky enough to have a fenced home property so running off leash in such a beautiful space was a vacation for him as well.
Pam was helpful with information on the local area, flexible to changing needs, provided a great local guide. I generally prefer to rent airbnbs that are not owner occupied but since Pams listing was so dog friendly (and I was brining my young, rather obnoxious, Yorkshire terrier) I reserved. I am so glad I did.
Do not be daunted by the fact Pam has her own dogs or that she pet sits for others. You hardly know they are there. I don’t know what kind of sound proofing they put in but I had was only aware of other dogs if we were outside. Dog lovers, this is the place for you!

We had a wonderful stay with Pam, she is a Super Host! Her suggestions were spot-on from whale watching to lobster rolls. She welcomed us with muffins and local ice cream plus treats for our dog. The extra amenities in her place made it the best bed & breakfast we've stayed at, she thought of everything. We had a great time and hope to go back soon! Thanks, Pam!
Pam is a great hostess and has a beautiful rental and gardens. She has anticipated all your needs and goes above and beyond in household items available. My dog loved the private fenced yard and Pam!

Pam is the perfect Airbnb Host! Her location is just as described -- perfect for dogs and their people. She put a great deal of thought into the design and layout of the space for visitors, as well as all of the thoughtful extras -- beach pass, beach chairs and towels, dog towels and blankets, complete cooking supplies and ingredients, yummy snacks and coffee, as well as extra toiletries in case you may have forgotten something. The Visitors Bureau should thank her for introducing her guests to local treats like Cape Cod Potato Chips, Beer, and local creamery Ice Cream. Fresh-made muffins and just-picked baby lettuce from her garden made us feel especially welcome. Her large fenced yard is beautiful and a wonderful place for your dog to run and play safely, alone or with her dogs. Best of all, she knows the area well and has great recommendations for beaches, restaurants, and anything you might need. We had a fantastic time visiting her sparkling clean guest apartment!

Pam's airbnb is one of the best I have ever stayed at! She has everything you could possibly need available for you and your dog if you are staying with your pet. The area is beautiful and the backyard is peaceful. The beach pass Pam provided was awesome to use for local beaches. She recommended a ton of great food options and things to do in the area. We loved the blueberry muffins, ice cream, and beer she left us. Our dog Sprout was so happy to be there. We will definitely be back!

I can’t say enough positive things about Pam and her place. If you’re looking for somewhere where you and your dogs are welcome, appreciated, and valued, look no further! Clean, every amenity in the house you can think of (truly, it is fully stocked), and a safe residential area with the beach and town nearby. There’s a full-size dog door as well so your pups can go in and out at their leisure. I can’t recommend Pam’s house enough!

Staying at Pam’s place Memorial Day weekend 2023 was the best experience. Her place is so clean and welcoming and is filled with too many extras to name. Pam and her husband Don were so friendly and welcoming! It is listed as dog friendly but you can’t truly understand how much it is set up for dogs until you stay there. Pam even watched our dramatic cocker spaniel who was protesting being left alone in an unfamiliar environment by barking/howling so that my husband and I could go out. Cannot recommend this place enough - we are already looking for when can visit again!

You absolutely have to stay here when visiting Cape Cod. You won’t ever get another host like Pam! Pam and her Airbnb were above and exceeded our expectations from the beginning!
First, she gives you local muffins and local Ice cream! She gives a very thorough tour of the place and EVERYTHING is labeled! She thought of absolutely everything, even the things you may have forgotten. Pam also knows all the great places to eat and see! On top of it all, it’s Dog friendly! Can’t wait to come back!
Pam was such a great host. We enjoyed our stay and so did my pup. Apartment was clean, organized, very dog friendly, and provided lots of accommodations. Would definitely stay there again.

This was my 1st Airbnb and my 1st vacation with my 2 year old Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. Pam was a wonderful host! She left me blueberry muffins and my favorite mint chocolate chip ice cream. The place was absolutely perfect. I think Finley may have had more fun then me! He could not wait to get outside and see his new doggie friends. Pam even had the same crate he has at home for him to sleep in. Pam gave me so many wonderful suggestions on places to visit and to eat. On the last night Finley hung out with the pup squad so I could go have a nice meal! The place was clean and beautiful . I highly recommend ! I will be going back in the very near future. Laura & Finley

We had a great time staying here with our 2 dogs! Pam was welcoming, accommodating and just really nice. She even got our favorite ice cream and made us blueberry muffins and the place was stocked with everything a dog could want - toys, bowls, treats, and a dog door out to a beautiful fenced in yard. The bed was super comfy and the shower water pressure was great. We had a busy weekend and Pam was so helpful and flexible. We definitely plan to stay here again. Thanks Pam!!
This is the second time I’ve stayed at Pam’s place and it was just as perfect as the first time.

Pam is the best host we could have asked for. She asked what things we liked, and then had them at the house for us. Ice cream, muffins and more. Our dog was welcomed with open arms and enjoyed playing with her dogs. When she knew it was our birthday, she made us a special treat to celebrate. We stayed for a month, in anticipation of moving to the cape. I feel like I have made a true friend. Would definitely recommend her!

Pam is an amazing generous and gracious host. This was by far one of the best places I’ve booked on Airbnb. It was my dog’s favorite vacation spot by far. Spotless ( one would never know dogs stayed there , completely odorless) , very comfy bed and comfy couches. Couch was large enough and comfortable enough to sleep on. Large fenced in yard was so awesome for my golden retriever. We don’t have a fenced in yard at home yet so she was in heaven. Place was so very well appointed. She thought of virtually anything and everything one might need ( both for people and for dogs). I could go on and on. I ‘ll conclude with don’t look any further. Book now. You won’t regret it. We thank you so much Pam for a lovely stay. Can’t wait to return in the warmer weather.

Can’t recommend Pam’s place enough. She is an incredible host, with a great listing in Barnstable. Central to everything on the Cape, it was a wonderful base of operations to explore all the Cape has to offer for us and our golden retriever. The listing is clean, accurately described if not even better, and Pam is a gracious, responsive, but not overbearing host. I would not hesitate to book this again and certainly plan to make this a mainstay when we visit Cape Cod.

This was the first time that we ever used air b&b and she set our standards to the max! Everything about her place made it feel as if we have been there a million times before. My fiancé was sent to work in the cape for a week. We packed up our everyday life and the dog. The moment we got to Pam’s house it felt like our daily routine hadn’t missed a beat! She had everything anyone and a dog could need for a normal day to day. We can’t thank her enough for that experience!!!
Pam's place was cozy and really well equipped. Pam was very generous and friendly. It was much bigger than I expected and had lots of interesting things. We really enjoyed staying there.

We had an absolutely perfect stay here and my corgi, Morty, felt right at home. Pam was thoughtful, caring, and efficient. The space was spotless. We had a bit of a messy check out (personal issues on my end), but she was so kind, patient, and compassionate. I couldn’t recommend this air bnb enough. Thanks Pam. ❤️

Wonderful place to stay with you and your pup
Great yard, great space
Pam was wonderful and even checked on our pup while we were at an extended event for us— great hospitality and space had everything you could want
We have local family and will tell all our friends
Book you space with Pam before it fills up!

Pam is a most gracious hostess. She really loves her guests and their dogs. If you have dogs that you want to bring to Cape Cod, then Pam is the way to go. The yard is fenced in with everything to keep your pet safe and happy. The living area is cozy with a kitchen and bathroom that has everything you need for your stay. She lives in a neighborhood that is safe enough and spacious enough to walk your dogs safely with little traffic. The bed is very comfortable and the TV room is comfortable with many books and two comfy couches.
Pam herself is the most friendly hostess I ever met. If your pet needs friends on its vacation, her dogs are really friendly also and like to play with other dogs. I really enjoyed my stay.
Pam is a world class host. Responsive, helpful, so very kind and thoughtful. I highly recommend staying at Pams.
We had a great stay! Can't say enough about Pam. She goes above and beyond what's expected. She certainly is a superhost! Teddy and Gracie loved Pam and their stay too!
Pam was terrific! She made us and our two pups feel welcomed!

Pam's place was great! Our two dogs had a blast. She had everything we could have needed and more. We are so grateful to her for keeping an eye on our anxious pups so we could go to dinner and around town without worrying about them. Our first trip to Cape Cod was so fun, and we are looking forward to the next time we get to go visit Pam.

We very much enjoyed meeting Pam and staying at her very comfortable home. The very thoughtful touches she provided, from the fresh flowers and snacks to helpful suggestions and time spent visiting with her and her dogs. Her home is very nicely located and our pup enjoyed meeting and playing with her two friendly dogs. We came home feeling like we have a friend in Barnstable and very much look forward to staying again!

We absolutely loved our stay as did our black lab! Pam’s apartment is exactly as described plus much more. It is very clean, has a wonderful outside fenced in backyard, many amenities (I.e beach chairs, towels, beach umbrellas, coolers, toiletries, dog toys and bowls), and some special touches that we have never experienced at any other Airbnb stay (I.e. local ice cream, homemade muffins, and a stocked fridge/snack cabinet).
Pam was incredibly accommodating and wonderful to work with. We are already planning our next stay at this Airbnb in Barnstable!

Staying at Pam's was incredible! She saved us so many times. We arrived late at night with a cranky toddler and no food. She provided thermometers for the little one, wine, beer, eggs, bread, all the staples to get through the night. And delicious ice cream and banana bread! The garden was a lovely place to drink tea in the morning and the beach pass and beach supplies really made a nice trip. Thanks so much!

Best host ever! Pam was very friendly and attentive. She provided us with ice cream and muffins as a treat. Lovely apartment that was spacious and comfortable. She was absolutely right that our dog would like it. All sorts of thoughtful touches for our dog (treats, food bowl) and us. The kitchen was well stocked with cold and dry food staples that we were not expecting. We definitely will return.

Pam is an absolute gem. She’s very thoughtful, kind, and very accommodating. The property is beautiful, my golden Bailey loved every single part of it. I can’t think of a better place to come with your dog! Pam has thought of everything, including beach essentials, little things you may forget to bring, and more importantly, catering to dog visitors. Very clean and has a cozy home feel. I will definitely be back for another stay.

Thank you Pam for the role you played in our 10 day stay in Cape Cod! When we return to the Cape we plan on booking with you! You have a lovely, comfortable place with beautiful gardens to escape in!! Being able to enjoy a vacation with the dogs meant the world to Susan, myself, Molly + Peanut !!

We enjoyed everything about our stay! Our two dogs especially loved the fantastic yard. Pam had everything we needed and more with dog treats and people treats including ice cream and gluten free muffins! If you love traveling with your dogs Pam’s place is perfect.

What a beautiful location! The yard and patio are perfect! You can’t ask for a better host. Treats for our pup and treats for us! Flowers in the yard are amazing! Everything is as it says on the website. If you get a chance to visit the area you will not be disappointed! Chuck and Rhonda from St A Florida

Pam’s place is great, and your dog definitely will love it! The apartment is comfortable and very well stocked with kitchen supplies and plenty of books if you need a beach read. :) We can’t wait to visit again!

I wish I could give Pam's place 10 stars! She was an amazing hostess. there was not an amenity forgotten! there was even a drawer in the bathroom If you accidentally forgot something at home. very dog friendly place. it's all about the dogs here. the fenced in yard has beautiful garden beds and lots of places for pups to sniff and explore. We had a brief power outage in the morning of our check out and she bought us breakfast to make up for the inconveniences. 10/10 will definitely stay here again!!!

Pam is a wonderful and congenial host. We had a great time - the property was absolutely beautiful - just as stated and more! Pam really has thought of everything and the space has all the amenities. Pam is full of knowledge and a great resource for things to do/see in the area . We would love to stay here again and would not hesitate to recommend this location.

Pam is a great host, very helpful and accommodating. Our dog loved the fenced in yard, treats, and toys. Pam made great recommendations on dog friendly places as well as restaurants in the area. We’ll definitely be coming back.

Pam is a wonderful host. She greeted me with open arms and welcomed my dogs into her beautiful airbnb. The location couldn't have been any better as I wanted to drive around the Cape. The unit was equipped with everything I needed...and more! Pam had snacks, ice cream, and banana bread waiting for me upon arrival.
My two dogs had the best time running around and playing fetch in the backyard. Pam and I took her dogs + my dogs for walks every morning which was a fun way to start each day. I would highly recommend staying at Pam's place. I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Thank you, Pam! Can't wait for next time.

Our Host: Pam was absolutely wonderful and so welcoming. She was so sweet with our Great Dane and even had a welcome sign just for her. Pam has thought of everything you could need while traveling and provided it. She greeted us with fresh muffins, ice cream, snacks, and beer. We felt as though we were staying at a luxury hotel inside of a loved one's home.
The place: The apartment was spacious at the same time. The bed was comfy and the pillows were fluffy. The bathroom was fully stocked with anything you might have forgotten at home. Our dog was able to play outside in the beautiful backyard while we made coffee. The living room was a nice place to sit with said coffee and read or watch TV.
Overall, Pam is awesome, this place is incredible and we will definitely be back!

5 stars isn’t enough!!! Pam is a lovely, gracious host who thought of everything to make our stay perfect! We’ve been to MANY Airbnb’s and this one is by far the best. Not once will you say, “I wish the house had…” because it does! The dogs are treated like family and so were we. The apartment was the perfect size for 2 adults and 2 dogs. The yard is fully fenced in with beautiful plantings and the patio is a perfect spot to start your day with plenty of morning sun. Location is convenient to beaches, the ferry, downtown, dog parks, and trails. You’ll love it here!
A beautifully appointed, seashore themed home complete with everything you and your dog could possibly need or want. Pam is a gracious and cordial hostess.

Absolutely loved my stay here. Pam is such a welcoming host; she made me and my two dogs feel right at home. My girls loved the beach that Pam recommended and they loved having new friends to play with in the backyard. The bedding was incredible- super soft sheets and great pillows. Everything looked and felt very clean. My dogs were at ease here, and so was I!
Incredible spot for dog parents. We had a blast! Thanks, Pam!

Couldn't ask for a better host or a better experience! I surprised my husband with a visit to Pam's because he grew up vacationing in Cape Cod, but it was my first time and our little 6-month old pup's first vacation out by the sea! All three of us absolutely loved it. Especially if you're someone who wants to explore all that the Cape has to offer (even during the off-season), Pam's place is a central location which makes driving to both East & West ends super convenient. We were so pleasantly surprised by both the nice weather and the access to authentic Cape restaurants, including The Impudent Oyster in Chatham and Lobster Trap in Bourne (which you MUST. MUST. MUST try if you like lobster rolls). As for the place itself, we were big fans of the interior design, from the marine and ocean color scheme to the bird-themed items around the house, with dog treats (and human treats, aka local ice cream and beers) to boot! Definitely coming back :)

Pam is an amazing host and her place is thoughtfully put together for dogs. The apartment is cozy and clean and has everything you need, from a fully stocked kitchen to snacks to freshly made muffins from Pam! It was a real delight to stay here with my dog and I would recommend it to anyone.

I'm not sure what we can say that hasn't been said already. The property is great and Pam really cares about making your stay perfect. The little touches make it a 5+ star in our opinion, and our pup would give it 10 stars if we let her. Great getaway for city people with a dog who wants a backyard!

Pam is the BEST host! Her Airbnb is heaven for dogs and humans alike. It is so cozy, amazingly well-stocked, and private yet accessible and close to tons of local attractions. The bed is extremely comfortable, the kitchen and bathroom both have everything you could possibly need. We were even able to cook ourselves a lobster dinner! Pam is great and gave us tons of recommendations for things to see and do. She even provided homemade muffins, local ice cream, and lots of great snacks. We cannot wait to return. :)

Pam's apartment is perfect for a Cape getaway with my dog. The apartment is roomy, yet cozy. The kitchen was nice, big and really well stocked complete with snacks and other cooking necessities such as spices, oil, coffee and filters. Lots of well thought out necessities for my dog too. It was the perfect spot for a writing retreat with my dog with easy access to local beaches and going out in Hyannis.
Great communication. Pam made us and our dog feel so welcome. Great fenced in yard.

Perfect everything. Our pups loved how free they were in this cozy home. The unit was very clean, cozy and comfortable. Everything was provided for by Pam. Pam is the perfect Airbnb host. All Airbnb hosts should take notes from her :)

When Pam says your dog will love it here, she means it! Pam was very welcoming and a great host. 10 out of 10 from me, and Rosa (my dog) gives it a 4 paws up and a tail wag! The place was clean, the backyard was perfect for Rosa to play and she settled in really quick.

I’d give 6 stars if I could. Pam is the ultimate host. Her place was immaculate and in a gorgeous location in a very private and quiet area.
Anything you could possibly need was provided including an arrival gift of home made muffins and local ice cream in my favorite flavor. Pam was there if needed but provided complete privacy for our stay. Pam is very pet friendly and has everything you could need for your pet including treats. Her place is very comfortable and clean. Amenities included the Kcups, creamer, sugar, a couple local beers, soda, jam…. It goes on and on.

This beachy oasis was perfect as a cozy Cape getaway! Not only did we feel at home, but our pooches did too! Our hostess was so gracious and put the finishing touches on a great stay!!! Highly HIGHLY recommend!!!!

Pam is an outstanding host. She provided us with sugar-free ice cream, and baked sugar-free muffins for us. The apartment is set up for everyone's comfort. The fenced garden is great for the dogs to safely run around in. The location is convenient to get to beaches, great restaurants, and most of the what the cape has to offer. It was our first vacation with the dogs, and it couldn't have been easier to take them along with us.

Where do I begin?
The space was absolutely incredible in every way. Everything you could need/want for a nice getaway. If you have pets this is the perfect place for you. Our little guy had friends to play with and the entire yard is fenced in.
I have absolutely noting negative to say about Pam's incredible hospitality or the rental.
We booked for a week and were ready to enjoy our week's vacation, but mother nature had different plans and blessed us with a Nor-easter. We ended up losing power and Pam and her husband sprung into action and supplied power via their generator and we were able to adapt and overcome. She did everything in her power to make the stay memorable, even with the storm looming over us.
We will surely come back soon...
Pam is amazing and everything was perfect! She goes out of her way to make you feel welcome and at home during your stay!

Pam is an amazing host and her place is perfect! It has everything you could ever need (including delicious banana bread that she made and ice cream). Our dog loved the backyard and playing with Pam’s dogs, and he can’t wait to visit Pam and her dogs again. Thank you for your wonderful hospitality Pam, and we look forward to staying at your place again!

Pam is a wonderful host with a beautiful garden and private oasis.
Her dog guests are pampered as much as her human ones. Great location for visiting the entire Cape. Highly recommended.

Pam is a super great HOST.
we enjoyed very much every single minute we stayed at her place.
our little dog loved the private fenced backyard and he got to play with Pam's dogs too.
Pam's place is in a dead-end street so it's very quiet and has a very relaxing atmosphere , her Garden is very beautiful. I took advantage the BBQ grill .
Pam's Banana Nut cake is to die for. And she welcomed us with locally made Ice Cream.
The kitchen is complete and it has everything you will ever need.
The bedroom is very cozy, the bathroom is ample and clean.
The Dining room is perfect size and the living room has a really good selection of books.
within a 5 minutes drive from Pam's Place there are many stores available, so you can just head out to town, buy your groceries and bring them in to the kitchen .which is fully stocked with everything and anything you'll need to prepare your own meals.
Also don't forget to check out Hathaway's Pond, there are 2 doggie parks (large and small dogs), fully fenced.
Hyannis is a short drive away and the whale watching Boat is also a few minutes away.
this is my first time in Massachusetts, but I can't wait to come back again.
I highly recommend Pam's place if you have a furry friend, he/she will appreciate it very much.
All the other reviews are spot on. This place is fabulous and so is the host! Super cute, nicely decorated, with everything you could need plus more.

We had an amazing stay with our dog!! Pam is the most gracious hostess! She had muffins and ice cream from a local creamery ready for us at check-in, which was such a nice treat!! There was everything we needed like beach chairs and towels, beach pass to the local beaches, and coolers. She also had a cute welcome sign for our dog and had all these toys and treats for him. It was so sweet!! Our dog loved playing in the backyard that’s bigger than ours at home. Pam is also the nicest person, so friendly and kind. I cannot say enough good things about our stay especially since it’s so hard to find a dog friendly rental. We’ll definitely be back when we’re in the area!

Pam is more than a Super Host. In the many Airbnb’s that we have stayed in, none have been so we’ll provisioned. Pam has thought of everything that you could possibly need, from a full complement of spices and condiments in the well equipped kitchen to soaps, lotions, shampoos, etc in the bathroom. This is a very dog friendly place and our dog Marley was very comfortable in a fully fenced & beautiful yard which also has a comfortable patio with a Weber grill, comfortable seating, etc. Pam is a very friendly & warm person, easy to converse with. The ice cream and home baked banana nut bread were an added bonus along with a refrigerator with soft drinks beer, juices, eggs & much more. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
Wow! What a great place to stay. Pam thought of everything to make your stay superb! We can’t wait to visit again and we would definitely recommend Pam’s place.

We had a wonderful time staying at Pam and Don’s apartment in Barnstable! They went above and beyond and greeted us with delicious ice cream from a Cape Cod creamery, incredible homemade banana nut bread, and a couple of cans of Cape Cod beer. Our dog also had an awesome stay and loved playing with their dogs and going in/out the doggie door, playing with the toys and in the incredible fenced in yard. The location is in a quiet neighborhood and about 15 minutes from Hyannis. Pam recommended a delicious seafood restaurant Spanky’s (dog friendly) with outdoor covered seating. We also went to the Black Cat which is also dog friendly and has a really cool back section with a bar that serves drinks, appetizers, and dinner. We were so fortunate that we found out that the Cape Cod baseball league was playing in town and it was an easy walk and we were able to catch the end of the game. Thanks again Pam & Don for the wonderful hospitality and making it so special for our dog!!

With our first vacation in over a year, we weren't sure what to expect. This space felt personal, cosy, and truly accommodating. The yard is fantastic, Pam had any and everything we needed, including beach chairs and ice packs, and she was super friendly and very helpful. Her recommendations led to some great adventures! To top it all off, Pam had everything we needed to make our dog feel like part of the gang. We'll certainly stay here again.

We had the pleasure of staying in Pam’s awesome place with our dog, Walter, last week. Her attention to detail is unmatched…ensuring that your stay is comfortable, easy, and homey…even when traveling with your dog! We kept joking that this trip was really for Walter, and staying here made it the truth. Not only are humans needs met (especially with ice cream, and freshly baked delicious muffins!!), but your pup’s needs are also met, right down to the Welcome sign above the food dishes. The landscaping in her yard is gorgeous as well, definitely an inspiration if you love to garden yourself! Fresh, gorgeous little tussie mussies were placed in different rooms as well. I couldn’t stop looking at them! We look forward to being able to come stay with Pam again! Thanks for everything!!! ♥️

Pam is amazing and her place is gorgeous. It’s located very close to shops, beaches, and food, and has a lovely outdoor space. She helped our little Poppy come out of her shell. We had a great time and plan on returning soon!

Pam is one of the warmest hosts I've ever had and I highly recommend her place to anyone visiting the Cape with a dog. Pam offered to watch our dog on multiple days if we were going out to eat or somewhere that might not be dog-friendly. The fenced-in backyard was great for our dog and we enjoyed a lot of time sitting in the yard watching her run around. Location-wise, it's very central for driving around the cape and close to some very nice beaches. It's hard to beat going from the beach to an incredibly green backyard in 15 minutes. Inside felt like home and we had everything we needed - cooking supplies, extra toiletries, internet, streaming services. Pam even had local beer and ice cream waiting for us when we arrived, plus home-baked banana bread. It's obvious that she's put a lot of thought and time into making guests' stays as comfortable as possible and I would go back again in a heartbeat.

You can expect spacious, clean, well-stocked amenities in this space. Pam is incredibly kind and respectful, her dogs are the sweetest and this space is perfect for any summer trip to the Cape. We are so grateful to have found this space and certainly hope to return soon.

Pam's place is a God Send! She was so welcoming and accommodating to us and our fur baby, Riley, who got the chance to visit with and make some new furry and human friends :D Everything was clean, so lovely, and it truly is catered to the furry friends. She had a basket of toys to welcome him when we walked in and water in the water dish. Even though the weather was crappy all weekend (Memorial Day), it kept the holiday travelers away so it wasn't all bad. Her gardens are simply lovely and we get an excuse to come see it in full bloom later in the year. to enjoy them in full bloom! The amenities were very well stocked, right down to the room fans so I don't have to bring my own next time. I highly recommend Pam's place when you are in the Cape. We will definitely go back!

Pam’s place was perfect for a weekend trip! Great location and she was so helpful with local suggestions. The huge fenced in backyard was a big plus for traveling with our dog. We will definitely visit again!

Pam was a wonderful host! Before we checked in, she had some muffins and icecream waiting for us. The house was very well equipped and was extremely comfortable. We especially enjoyed meeting her dogs. I would highly recommend staying with Pam as she is a great host.

The true definition of a superstar host with a perfect place! I cannot recommend this place enough for those with dogs. The home is sparkling clean filled with amenities and attention to detail. The location is perfect for all the best things Cape Cod has to offer. A short drive anywhere. Our dogs didn't want to leave and loved the fenced yard.

Pam's place was a wonderful escape. Our dog, Mazie, did indeed love it and so did we. Pam was an incredible host, with lots of great advice on local activities and restaurants. She was also very helpful when I had an unexpected injury the first day.

Pam’s place was just amazing. Easy to find, quiet and safe neighborhood, good location with lots of restaurants nearby, great sized fenced-in yard, etc. It was extremely clean, despite the fact that it’s a (very) dog friendly place! We enjoyed having convos with Pam and seeing our dog play with her dogs. Pam and Don went above and beyond to make sure we had all we needed. The kitchen is well stocked and every cabinet was even labeled! We hope to be back again!!

Perfect for 1-2 ppl and their dog(s). The set-up is just like an in-law suite with the host, Pam, next door in the main house. Its a great location with plenty of privacy, a lovely neighborhood yet close to beach (about a mile) and restaurants, Whole Foods, shops, etc. I stayed with my sister and new dog for a weekend in early March and our only complaint is that we couldn't stay longer. A a host, Pam is a gem. 100% responsive, easy-going, and has thought of everything and you will find her thoughtful little touches throughout the place. The piece de resistance is, of course, the amazing back yard and deck accessed by your private entrance. You and your dog(s) will LOVE it. We stayed in March so I can only imagine how beautiful and colorful it is in summer with all the flowers. We will visit again for sure and highly recommend Pam's place.

If you want a host who is kind and thoughtful then stay at this Airbnb! It’s perfect for dogs but also people too! It’s a perfect location. Everything was so homey and comfortable. We loved it and look forward to returning!!

Honestly when Pam says your dog will love it here and you will too— she means it!! From a personalized welcome for my corgi Harry, to treats and toys for him, snacks and personalized local ice cream for us, we sure felt at home. Harry loved playing with her dogs and felt like it was his own personal dog park, the next morning he already knew to wait by the fence for his new best friend Julie to play fetch with. Pam told us local beaches and trails to check out & she did not disappoint! This apartment was so clean, fully stocked with cooking supplies and spices, the tv had everything we could ask for, and the water pressure was amazing. Pam was so sweet, great to chat with, and made sure everything was taken care of, including shoveling after a big storm so we could safely walk to our car. I can understand why people in the guest book have already stayed here 5 times because Harry and I will absolutely be coming back!!

This is one of the best AirBnb stays that I've ever had! The apartment is super clean, cozy and well-stocked. If you need or forgot anything, I'm sure you will find it in the apartment. It was perfect for the long weekend getaway needed to recharge and to visit family. Pam goes above and beyond with her hospitality and genuine kindness. If you need anything, she is there to help. The muffins were amazing! She also had sorbet and orange juice for me. We had a snow storm and they took the time to help me clean off my car! If you have, pups they will love it too! I absolutely loved my stay and will be back again soon!

I can't overstate how wonderful our stay was at Pam's place. She accommodated a later than usual check in and check out with no problems and welcomed us in the apartment with homemade banana bread, fresh cut flowers, local beer and ice cream, and all the spices/utensils/toiletries/books/etc. that I would have in my own house. We really felt right at home from day one. While there we got to know her dogs who were every bit as joyful and welcoming as Pam was. Her backyard was perfect for our Luna who barely ever wanted to come inside! I can't recommend this place highly enough, though I secretly don't want anyone else to find out about it so I can keep coming back :)

If you have and/or love dogs, this is a little piece of mid-cape heaven. Pam keeps a perfect place with everything that you could want or need and if by chance there's something missing she will take care of you (Thanks for the lobster crackers and picks, Pam). A quiet, private neighborhood and a short distance to Barnstable center make for great walks and our dog had a ball playing with Pam's. The place is cozy and comfortable and the little touches like flowers and snacks (and ice cream!) made us feel welcome and relaxed. An unexpected treat: The excellent water pressure made for great showers. I highly recommend Pam's place. You won't be disappointed.

If you are looking for a stay in Cape Cod for you and your dog(s) and are the type of traveler who saves different possible matches and then weighs lists of pros and cons, I can save you a lot of time/effort – book Pam’s place!
My two small dogs and I stayed for about 3 ½ weeks beginning on Thanksgiving Day. We could not have felt more at home. After I mentioned Christmas presents in an email (thereby verifying I celebrate the holiday), Pam decorated the inside of the apt for our arrival, planted a Christmas tree right outside the front door and decorated the yard. So thoughtful and brought cheer to a challenging year/holiday season.
The amenities Pam provides are amazing – not only was everything we could possibly need provided but in many cases, there were different varieties of the thing I needed!
The apartment is in a lovely, wooded neighborhood perfect for long walks with pooches and the charming downtown of Barnstable with cafes, a market and a small beach is a manageable walk or quick drive away. Plus, all the shopping, restaurants, sites of Hyannis are only a few miles away and the rest of the Cape is easily accessible.
The dogs were sad to leave – they enjoyed the big fenced in yard, playing with the resident dogs and the attention Pam gave them.
We will absolutely be back!
Great apartment and host! We loved the ice cream Pam provided and fully stocked kitchen. Our pup enjoyed the doggie door and yard.

Our stay at Pam's place was spectacular!! She made our little pup feel at home, which is no small feat since she is a nervous rescue dog! We humans also had a fabulous time and we greatly enjoyed all the nice amenities and special touches to make us feel like we were on vacation. Thanks for a great stay! We will be back :)

Pam is an outstanding host! Check in was seem-less! Property is quiet and well maintained. A separate fenced in area with all the amenities for a pup! She even got us ice cream, local beer, and a banana bread!!! Thank you so much! 11/10! You won’t regret this retreat!

We had a lovely stay in Barnstable at Pam's! The apartment is comfortable and has a nice homey atmosphere. Pam takes care to add some very nice special touches that made us feel welcome. I loved the fresh flowers so much! Our pup, Sadie loved using the doggy door and playing in the fenced in yard. She also appreciated the basket of toys and even some cookies by the door! Very sweet and thoughtful! The apartment is super clean and the location is perfect for a stay on the cape! We hope to visit again!

This will be one of your favorite stays and Pam is an amazing hostess. She goes out of her way to make you feel welcome with so many amenities. Our dog truly loved the fenced in yard to run around and the doggie door. We’ll be back again sometime for sure!

Pam’s place was awesome! So many little touches, including ice cream on arrival and sparkling waters in the fridge. Made our dogs feel super at home too with a very large back yard and dog door that they loved. It was an excellent stay!

Pam has everything you need and more. We had everything we needed for our 5 night stay and it was nice to not have to pack things like beach chairs, towels and coolers. Crosby loved the fenced in back yard and doggie door. He was so sad to come home. We will be back for sure!

Dog heaven! The place is spotless, has everything you need or you forget to bring. Pam is an amazing host. She provides you all the little extras you don't get at a hotel. Highly recommend if you want to get away and wanna bring the dog with you!!

This was the best AirBnB experience we’ve ever had. Pams place is great but Pam makes it even better. From the ice cream to the local tips - just the best!
The place is roomy and completely SPOTLESS
Location is perfect - 2 minutes to Barnstable Village and less than 10 to Hyannis shops and restaurants.
Can’t wait to return. (Next time with our dog!)

Pam was right - our dog Ollie loved her place and we did too! The location was perfect for the activities we had planned. Right in the middle of the Cape with easy access to golf, great restaurants and visiting close friends. We drove up to P-Town, Truro and Wellfleet for shopping, wine tasting and a drive-in movie.
The apartment was filled with conveniences like Keurig coffee, creamer, filtered water, snacks and plenty of toys for Ollie. He even had his own water and food bowl set up when we arrived.
Her yard is so pretty and you can tell immediately that she takes pride in her space. It’s completely fenced in and includes two different seating areas to use to sit and watch the birds. I saw many species of including blue jays and even a hummingbird outside of the kitchen window. The yard was very peacefully and the surroundings are private and quiet.
We are looking forward to booking with her again. A must for all dog owners!

The reviews are true! This place is amazing. Pam is so kind and watched our dog a few times when we couldn’t take him somewhere. The location is calm, peaceful and central so it’s easy to explore the whole cape. We decided to do a whale watch in the harbor nearby and would definitely recommend! Overall we are grateful for having had such a nice, relaxing trip in the middle of this crazy year. Highly recommend.

Pam’s place is great! We really enjoy our stay and it was just what we needed. It truly is a haven for dog lovers and anything you could possible need is taken care of. As other have said, Pam really goes above and beyond. There was even local ice cream and homemade bread waiting when we arrived!

Expect warm greetings, a homey feel, beautiful landscaping and backyard, and if you forgot to pack anything, don't worry- Pam has almost every amenity that you can think of-wow! And, of course, meeting her sweet pups!

This was one of the best and one of our most favorite Airbnb experiences. Pam is one of the most incredible hosts. She has truly thought of everything - beach chairs and umbrellas, beach towels, coolers, ice packs, snacks, drinks, beer from the local brewery, coffee. It feels like a home away from home and she had thought of everything we could possible need for a vacation/beach weekend. I have never had such a well prepared Airbnb. Pam goes above and beyond in every way. She also gave us some great food recommendations, places we would have never found on our own. The beach pass is also a huge benefit and Pam gave us her favorite beach recommendation - which was a beautiful beach! This is a home away from home. Pam is the ultimate host who goes above and beyond for her guests---human and furry. If you're looking for a lovely, relaxing, comfortable stay, this is the place!!! You and your doggie will want for nothing, We highly recommend and we plan on returning.

“Your dog will love it here”. This is sooo true. And so did my wife & I. Pam is a great host. The place was clean & well maintained. She has everything you need there. Her dogs are super friendly also.

Excellent! Highly recommend staying at Pam's, especially if you are traveling with

beautiful setting, extra unexpected amenities, goodies to munch on and drink while you settle in, helpful tips, a very homey feeling, even a doggy door for your puppies to enjoy the outdoors and a red fire hydrant for your puppies to sniff, even help in contacting a vet for your puppies needs. absolutely lovely!!!

A hidden Gem on the cape. We just returned from a weekend at Pam's with our dog and the stay couldn't have been more special. The kitchen is stocked with everything you could ever want (coffee, tea, juice, yogurt, snacks, ice cream, homemade muffins and cookies) and Pam provides beach chairs, beach towels and beach passes. Our dog got anxious about the July 4th fireworks and Pam spent the evening hanging with our dog to comfort him when we couldn't be there. If you are traveling with your dog to the cape, there is no place else to stay. We are looking forward to booking our next stay with Pam and her dogs.

SHORT REVIEW:
Excellent!
LONG TMI REVIEW:
On the drive up to Barnstable, my little Chloe had a sudden medical emergency. Unfortunately, after spending hours at the vet's office, she did not survive. Pam was exceptionally compassionate, offering to let me cancel the stay with no penalty. Since I was 20 minutes from her place and 3+ hours from home, I thought the safest and best thing to do in the situation was to stay anyway.
Pam's airbnb is absolutely the best place I've stayed, for many reasons, the first being for how gentle and sweet she was with me showing up completely traumatized by my dog's sudden death.
The apartment is so clean -- no animal smells, no fur anywhere.
It was wonderful to have snacks on hand -- fresh fruit, muffins, cookies, and ice cream. I'm not typically a beer drinker, but I really appreciated the Cape Cod Beer in the fridge. The apartment is well-stocked with pretty much anything you could want -- beach chairs and towels, shampoo and conditioner, bug spray...you name it. That one thing you forgot to pack is probably there.
Although it might not be "walking distance" for most people, you can walk to at least one of the town beaches from there. I appreciated being able to experience Cape Cod in a less touristy way, and every suggestion Pam provided about beaches to visit or other things to see was on target. On the way home I stopped off at Spoon & Seed, one of Pam's recommendations, and had one of the best meals ever.
I know my dog would have loved this place, with the large fenced in yard (check out the new cute lawn ornament), treats and fresh water waiting on arrival, and company of other well-behaved and well-loved dogs. I completely plan on returning someday.

Pam and her apartment were absolutely amazing! Check-in was super easy as she greeted us when we pulled up. Having a beautiful, fenced-in yard was also perfect for our dog, Lemon. She constantly had other furry companions to play with (and I'm certain she wanted to stay there). I couldn't recommend staying here enough.
