Mary's place is beautiful, cozy, clean and in a great location! Couldn't have been a more perfect place for my boyfriend and I. I'd love to come back.

We were welcomed by a fruit and cheese tray and Mary went the extra mile to get a drink both myself and my pregnant wife would enjoy. The space is welcoming and perfect for a Cape Cod getaway. Would definitely stay again.

It's clear that Mary has worked extremely hard to create the ideal space for a stay in cape cod. As a host she was very welcoming, keeping clear lines of communication open at all times and greeting us with wine and cheese etc which was much appreciated after a long drive.
She also goes above and beyond by handing over detailed information about the local area which was a great help when it came to deciding on which beach to visit, where to eat, shopping options etc.
The space is beautifully furnished/decorated, spotlessly clean and boasts one of the comfiest beds I've ever slept in!
Location wise it's ideal. Situated in a quiet residential area, you won't find much on your doorstep but it's a good place to base yourself if you wish to explore different parts of the cape by car.
All in all, Mary provided an excellent place to stay and our only regret is that we couldn't hang around a bit longer.

Mary's place was the perfect getaway from the city to spend a weekend on the Cape. The loft was nice and clean, with plenty of natural light, which created a peaceful ambiance-- just what my fiance and I needed. The fruit and cheese tray was a lovely addition to our relaxing weekend. Thanks again!
We had a great time at Mary's place! She is very welcoming and even secured the place

My girl and I had a great stay here. We took the ferry to the vineyard every morning which was about 25 minutes away. The place was very cozy and Mary even had a personalized welcome note with a nice bottle of wine. Definitely book time here if you can.
Our first stay in an Airbnb lodging was fantastic. Absolutely recommendable.

Mary and Tom's loft was absolutely wonderful! We had a great trip on the Cape and the loft was everything we were expecting and more! We loved the wine and cheese she left us and are so happy to have such amazing hospitality! Thank you again!! Highly recommend!
Mary's place was just as clean and nice as it appeared in the pictures (bigger actually) and was a great spot for a weekend stay.
The studio apartment is perfect for a couple looking to enjoy the Cape Cod area. Very comfortable accommodations and helpful hosts.

This was an amazing experience... the studio is spacious and sparkling clean and tastefully decorated. We felt like we were home! Would definitely be telling friends and family to visit...we will be delighted to stay here again 🙂
Great price, cozy room for a couple.

Terrific set up in a beautiful private loft connected to owner's home. Very much enjoyed the location and spending time out on the Cape. Tom and Mary are terrific hosts, and were very responsive. Thanks for a great stay, Mary and Tom!!

The place was perfect. The amount of space of the apartment and how clean everything was was great. Mary left a bottle of wine and food for us and a package of things to do in Cape Cod. The apartment looks brand new and the space is very private. If I return to the Cape, I will be staying here again.

Mary was wonderful and the apartment was perfect. It was spotless, comfortable, and very well designed. She made everything extremely easy and exceeded our expectations in every way. The location is pretty central to different areas of the Cape, we cruised up to Provincetown for the day and also saw Hyannis and Chatham. I would stay here again.

Our stay at Mary's place was a memorable one. It felt just like home. The place was impeccable and we admire Mary's attention to small details. Thank you for making our stay comfortable and memorable.
Mary made our stay on the cod truely special. The apartment was very clean, cost and made us feel like home instantly. The place is also perfectly located for trips. Thanks Mary for your hospitality

Mary's place was absolutely lovely, with perfectly themed finishings, and made for a very comfortable stay. We could tell that a lot of thought was put into designing the space. The personal touches of wine, cheese and scones made for a wonderful welcome gift. We would love to stay here again for our next visit.

We had an amazing stay at Mary's. The place is beautifully done and Mary had made sure that you have everything you need - from wine, cheese, tea and coffee, beach towels and even chairs for the beach! She was great at communicating, just loved everything about it - thank you!

This was one of the best Airbnb's we've been too. I felt like I was staying in a hotel. It was a comfortable living space for two people and she was nice enough to let us borrow her beach chairs. She also provided a handbook of places to go which gave us a lot of ideas on restaurants and beaches since we were unfamiliar with the area. Mary always responded quickly when we had any questions. It was a pleasure meeting her. I would definitely come back for another stay and recommend anyone to come and stay here!
This space is lovely and very comfortable - a perfect home base for exploring the Cape! Mary is a very gracious host and made sure we had everything we needed. We hope to visit again soon!

Had a lovely weekend at Mary's apartment. Came down to the cape for the Falmouth road race and enjoyed the many restaurants and things to do around Mashpee/Barnstable. The space was lovely, very clean, and spacious. Mary was extremely hospitable, leaving us wine & cheese platter along with delicious scones for breakfast and a nice packet of suggested restaurants and attractions. She's thought of everything you may need from k-cups, cream & sugar, to shampoo and beach towels! Would definitely recommend this space and will hopefully return in the future!

Marie & Tom's place was the cherry on the sundae for our Cape Cod trip. The place is beautiful and the pictures do not do it justice! Communications were clear and concise. Location is great and hosts really go the extra mile to make you feel at home. Thanks again Mary and Tom!

We had an amazing stay and everything was EXCELLENT. Mary was a great hostess, the place was exceptional and very clean. Location of the house is close to everything Cape Cod has to offer. This is a 5 star accommodation.

My wife and I had an absolutely tremendous experience staying at this beautiful space. Everything was spotless when we first entered and you can tell Mary puts a ton of energy into making her guests feel at home and appreciated. And the wine and cheese upon arrival...simply the greatest cherry on top of a wonderful place. We both give our highest recommendation to this lovely space on the Cape!

It was a pleasure to be welcomed to stay at Mary's. Her and Tom kicked off our pre-honeymoon with the warmest gesture of giving us the sweetest and most thoughtful wedding card upon our arrival. Their studio was equipped with everything you'd need. Mary was very accommodating with us and communication was extremely prompt. The studio was very comfortable as if I was in my own home. We'd definitely visit Mary and Tom again when in Cape Cod.

Mary was a great host. The place was impeccable... Very clean & met all our needs. She greets you with a bottle of wine & cheese which is an extra touch! She's also readily available for anything you may need. We loved staying here & recommend to anyone looking in the Cape!

Mary and Tom were amazing hosts! Everything in the apartment was clean and beautiful decor. There is so much to do in Cape and their house is located in a perfect quiet area. I will definitely be staying back with them in the future :)

Mary's place was the perfect space for a relaxing four days on the Cape! The studio is actually much bigger than it seems and super clean! The queen bed was so comfy and we loved that the home was in a quiet neighborhood, but close enough to beaches and town. Their home is centrally located where we had easy access to Dennis, Hyannis, Chatham and even over to Nantucket for the day. Mary provided everything you could need for a long weekend, coffee, snacks, wine and a very informative guest book for things to do, places to eat and even things to do on a rainy day! We had an excellent experience here and we will definitely be back again!

I absolutely loved this place! Just like the listing promised, we were greeted in our new room with wine (Mary checked which wine I preferred beforehand), cheese, and crackers. My initial reaction was that the room was definitely bigger than what I saw in the pictures. They have an impeccable taste for decor from the choice of tiles in the bathroom shower to the beached-theme paintings and sea-stars lined against the wall in the kitchen. Mary was very friendly and responsive and I would definitely recommend this place to anyone interested in vacationing in Cape Cod.

Mary was great- she sent me instructions on the door lock, parking directions, and even asked me what kind of wine I like and left a bottle chilled in the fridge for us! The space itself was immaculate and new, very spacious, the kitchenette was very convenient, as was the private entrance so we didn't disturb anyone with our comings and goings. The bathroom and walk-in tiled shower are brand new, and the whole space is very nice Cape cottage style. With the mid-cape location close to other towns, but off the highway, it's a great location close to Mashpee, Hyannis shopping, restuarants. etc.

Mary's place was our base for a family wedding on the Cape as well as exploring the area & worked perfectly. A wooded neighborhood off the beaten track, we had our own parking space & keyless entry to the suite so came & went as we pleased.

Such a nice time at the Cape! Mary was a perfect and gracious host, giving us all the privacy we needed but being available to us whenever we had a question. The listing is very accurate: the space was very clean and up-to-date, with plenty of nice extras like beach towels, coffee, snacks, and a lovely cheese plate upon arrival. A beautiful neighborhood with houses spread out and gorgeous Cape cottages and gardens in every direction. We hope to return!

I was in Mary's house for the 4th of July weekend with my wife. I can't describe how beautiful that place is. Everything was clean and beautiful decorative. A bottle of wine and cheese was there waiting for us. Thank you for this experience Mary. Definately our next Cape Cod choice.

We had a great stay with Mary! Everything was perfect! A really big room/Apartment, everything in perfect condition and a nice style/ Design. She made everything childsafe for our 1 year old son and organised a highchair and a pack'n'play. It was the best to have some snacks and wine in the room when we arrived. The surrounding is very calm, only neighborhood. The access to the pond is not so easy for non-residents. That was the only thing that I was a little bit disappointed about, but it was not Marys fault.

I'd give my stay with Mary 5 Stars (6 Stars if I could)! The space was immaculate, the bed was ridiculously comfortable, and we were greeted by a cheese plate and a bottle of wine! Mary was great, she was available whenever we needed to get in touch with her and was generous in offering us a set of beach chairs to use for the weekend! I am hopeful I'll be able to make it back to this air bnb in the future!

Mary was great - it definitely was a 5-star hotel experience! You get as much privacy as you need, but she is still there to assist with anything. The studio We were greeted by a cheese plate and a bottle of wine, as well as muffins for breakfast - the best airbnb experience I've ever had.
Great Stay! Nice and clean place!
Wonderful stay! Impressive by amenities and items offered in the house! Peaceful and secluded house.

We had a great stay during our vacation on Cape Cod. Location is great, close to everything we needed! It was close to cute cafes, fish markets, supermarkets, and a number of nice beaches. The house was adorable, clean, private and felt very relaxing. It looked exactly as the pictures. It had nice balcony to relax in the morning and a backyard for playing if you have kids. The kitchen was well stocked with what you need to cook and a thoughtful coffee station. The porch was nice to relax and grill in the evening. Adi was very responsive and the instructions were very clear. Would definitely return if we get the opportunity!

Beautiful, peaceful getaway. Exactly like described/shown. Lots to do in the house for adults and kids! Felt just like home. Great for a weekend girls trip! Lots to do within driving distance! Would 100% stay here again! Aditya is easy to get in touch with and responds very quickly. Very helpful, always providing clear instructions. She has a beautiful house, highly recommended!

The Ui family had a comfortable stay in a clean space.
If I travel here again, I'll find it again.
Loved our stay here! Super responsive hosts, great location, and beautiful place that matches the description! Would definitely recommend and stay again
We had an incredible stay at Aditya’s home. It was incredibly clean and had everything you might need while on a getaway. Aditya was extremely responsive and helpful. Will definitely stay here again!
Had a wonderful girls weekend here! It was clean and we felt very comfortable. Will definitely be back!
Relaxing. Great backyard for young kids to play

We loved staying at the Cape Haus! The house was impeccably clean, beautifully renovated and decorated and very comfortable. All the touches of home along with high quality towels and linens. Adi was extremely responsive and communicative. We would definitely stay here again!

We were able to get into the house earlier than check in and the smart lock made it convenient to come and go as needed. The house was very clean, great A/C and it had every amenity we could’ve wanted. Games, books, TV, full kitchen, washer and dryer with soap, 2 showers, big bedrooms, and a great outdoor space with a seating area, grill, and fire pit.
Adi answered every one of our questions within and hour (usually less) and provided helpful recommendations. Adi also remedied any problems we had (which were very few) very quickly. I would stay here again on my next trip to the Cape.

Had a fantastic long weekend stay at Cape Haus with 6 adults! Comfy beds, beautiful kitchen and super close to the beach and amenities. they even have board games for when it's rainy and great TV. Thank you again!
Aditya was a lovely host. The house is beautiful and fully stocked with all the things one could need. Aditya was responsive and very kind. We would happily stay at their home again!

The Cape Haus was a great location and perfect for a vacation from our home in Arizona! Some (of many) of the amenities we appreciated during our trip to celebrate the 4th of July and explore the history of the area were: comfortable beds, good water pressure (that heats fast), dual pane windows, great A/C (once we figured out the remote slides open), the quiet neighborhood, & the host’s eagerness to help with anything if needed! Adi’s quick response saved us when we were in a time crunch, faced with a decision about where to shop before heading to the Red Sox game. Osterville was perfect for coastal decor items and souvenirs for the family. The home was just as described - clean, modern decor, and a great home base for our adventures! We used the hosts’ guidebook nearly every day. We loved the day at Dowses Beach and our last stop of the week at the Snack Shack in Sandy Neck. We will spend more time at both on our next visit. It was a trip we will always cherish!

The house was great & Adi a wonderful host. Any questions we had she answered within minutes. Everything was neat & clean, comfortable with plenty of room to stretch out inside & out. The availability of beach towels, chairs, & umbrellas was greatly appreciated. Centrally located so that anywhere on the cape was a short drive away. Relaxing inside & peaceful outside with only birds breaking the silence. And so many ways to make coffee! Highly recommended. Thanks Adi!
dano

Went for a quick cape father's day and it was perfect! Easy check-in that felt like all the amenities of a nice hotel in town with all the comfort of a cape rental. Amazing outdoor area, good kitchen, and cozy rooms. Would consider more than a few nights here next time!
Aditya’s place is beautiful! Very clean and comfortable. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!!
Adi was a great host! Cute house perfect for a long girls weekend away!
Great place with a great host!

We really enjoyed our stay and the host was ultra responsive when we had a couple questions. The home is extremely clean and clearly well maintained. It was the perfect brief getaway to visit family for Thanksgiving. We will certainly be back for future visits to the Cape!

Aditya! She is a rockstar. Super communicable and just an overall pleasure to work with. The automated lock system was dying due to cold weather. Aditya reached out before I even had to and gave me the lockbox code. House was very clean and exactly as advertised. Kitchen has everything you need to cook whatever you want! House was stocked with fun board games and the back yard is huge with a beautiful fire pit. Only 10 minutes to down Hyannis. Definitely stay here!

What a delightful place for our last Airbnb stay before moving to our new home. Lots of space, clean and comfortable, thoughtfully decorated. Adi thought of all the little touches too that you need when traveling. Device chargers in the bedrooms, toiletry items including makeup wipe removers. We especially enjoyed the fire pit several fall evenings and playing one of the outdoor games in the backyard. Although near a main road, felt private. Close drive to restaurants and other attractions. Wish we could have stayed longer. Hope to return with family and explore the area more.

A fantastic stay at Aditya’s place. The house is immaculate and location perfect for a Cape Cod vacation.
We will be back!

The house was modern, wel kept, and definitely had recent updates to it. But that isn't super unusual for Airbnb. What really stood out was that the owner really went out of their way to make sure you had all the random incidentall stuff you needed. For instance, they had shampoo, conditioner, and makeup removing pads in the bathroom. They even had all the fixings for smores. You could tell a lot of thought was put into making your stay comforable.

Absolutely gorgeous home. Clean, bright and beautifully decorated. Located in a quiet private road. The host was responsive and accommodating. It was a very enjoyable stay. Would definitely come back.

We enjoyed our stay with our two young children (3 and 5 years old)! The house is very clean, spacious, comfortable, well-located (grocery store, pharmacy, restaurants nearby). The kitchen is very well equipped. We enjoyed the outdoor fireplace! Many small touches for children (games, highchair, dishes), hosts respond very quickly and have developed a guidebook with good suggestions of places to visit that we found very useful. We would most certainly stay at this place if we return to the area, it was perfect to go visit the surrounding area and enjoy the area. Thank you!!

We are an elderly German couple. And yes we are a bit like that. We like it clean, well organised, of really good quality. And even considering this I got to say: this was a marvellous experience. We were fully happy with the house. The description/pictures fully display what you get for your money. So 5 stars from me.

We had a wonderful time at Adi’s place. Everything was sparklingly clean and the house was very beautifully decorated. The location is very convenient to the beaches, shops and restaurants. Besides all of that, we are also very much impressed with the thoughtful details and provided toys/games/beach supplies/fire pit/grill. It was a five plus star experience for us and would highly recommend for everyone if traveling to the Cape.

Staying at Aditya's place was absolutely fantastic. Right from the get go, they are extremely communicative, friendly, and helpful. The house itself a split-level chalet with a few stairs to the upstairs rooms and bathroom and a few stairs down to the kitchen, bathroom, living room, and writing room. Each bedroom has a little balcony and the back yard also has a nice patio area with a gorgeous grill. The fire pit was what really made it special, allowing us to enjoy a crips New England evening without freezing too much.
The place is extremely well stocked (sheets, towels, wash clothes, utensils, dishes, etc.). The furnishings are all very well new and the design is impeccable.
We can't wait to come back and stay!

We truly enjoyed our time at the Cape Haus! Aditya was a wonderful, attentive host, and the house was clean and well appointed. Our only wish is that we could have stayed longer so would have had time to enjoy the fire pit and grill. Maybe on our next trip!

The home was gorgeous, beautifully decorated. Super clean. Directions and guidelines were simple and easy to follow. Everything about the set-up as well as communication made our stay comfortable and that much more enjoyable. Would highly recommend to anyone wanting to experience a relaxing getaway in the area.

enjoyed the layout and design of the house. Almost like a new house with fully equipment kitchen, washing/drying machines and furniture and fire pit in backyard, so much more. More important, owner responded to our request in reasonable time. I will definitely recommend this property to others.

This house is great. The furnishings are comfortable, clean, and tasteful. The place was exceptionally clean and well maintained. Most of all, the host was attentive and thoughtful. We had a great experience and would enthusiastically recommend this rental to anyone looking for a quiet, comfortable home in a convenient location.

We had a wonderful stay at Cape Haus by Aditya and Varsha. Their house is clean, organized, well stocked and nicely decorated. They have anticipated every need (my wife especially appreciated the makeup washcloths 😉). Having a nice yard and deck to sit outside and enjoy coffee or a drink was perfect for relaxing after the beach and an outdoor shower. They were quick to answer any questions before and during our stay. I would highly recommend staying here and we look forward to our return to Cape Haus.
The response was so quick with every question I had . The house was beautiful and a quiet area

Very nice, clean and cozy place at a great location in cape cod. House has all the amenities which made our stay super comfortable especially with a small kid. Aditya and Varsha made sure we had a very comfortable stay. Made sure we had every thing we needed and provided us with recommendations which made our trip very easy to plan. I would highly recommend this place!!!

What a great stay! The hosts were super accommodating, easy to get a hold of, and the location is super cute! We were there on one of the hottest days on Cape Cod, and the AC units cooled down the house SO nicely. Comfortable beds, great bathrooms, amazing kitchen with coffee bar and a great backyard. Location wise it's a super easy drive to beaches, shopping, and restaurants. HIGHLY recommend staying there (I know we will again!)

Verry nice stay in the house of Aditya.
Everything was available in the house, great bbq and nice attentions of the owners.
We’ll come back!
Very clean house in a great location. Lots of small touches that elevated the experience, would recommend to anyone looking in the area.
a great time! A beautiful home that is SOOOO well maintained.
Very thoughtfully created space in the heart of cape cod! Aditya n Varsha are great hosts and have a beautiful space to rent with all amenities.
Awesome place, really nice interior design and good quality things. Had everything we needed and more. Would stay here again.
One of the best Airbnb experiences we have had. Our family had a great stay with them. They’d thought out every little detail. Great communicators also which is a plus. 5/5 would recommend
We had an amazing time at Cape Cod. The house is in a very nice quiet location, beautiful and clean. Thank you Aditya and Varsha

We had a wonderful stay here. Aditya and Varsha are exceptional hosts and very responsive. Theirs is a beautiful house in a great location. Lots of space and fully stocked kitchen (utensils, plates, not food), lots of kids games, beach chairs, great fire pit and chairs.
Very thoughtful about kids too with kids plates, outdoor chairs, games. And ingredients for s’mores.
15 minutes drive or less to several beaches. Many cafes for great breakfasts and lunches in the vicinity. We will be visiting again.
Peaceful and cozy space. We had a nice time despite the rainy weather!

If you’re looking to get away with family or friends, this is the house! Very clean, rooms are large, beautiful out door space, close to shopping and great restaurants. I was there for Mother’s Day weekend with all the mothers in my family, we had a wonderful time and the house was perfect.

This is our third trip to Bonnie and Mark’s place, and it was just as delightful as our past stays! The space is so lovely, comfortable, and private, and it’s close by to a number of beautiful beaches. Bonnie and Mark are wonderful hosts - they’ve thought of everything, from the welcome gifts and local recommendations to their beautiful decorations. We love our time here and can’t wait to be back!
Lived the house. Great location. Close to fabulous restaurants and lots of hiking trails and I was allowed to bring my puppy

This was one of the loveliest homes we have stayed in. It was full of everything we needed and more. The beds and bathrooms were so clean and very well maintained. The yard was beautiful and the steps down to the stream was a fun feature the kids loved. Everything looked just like the pictures, if not better. Perfect home for our family of five plus our pup.

A lovely house in stunning grounds. We had an amazing stay in Mark and Bonnie’s place - possibly the best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in. The photos don’t do it justice, it’s immaculate. Wonderful outdoor area with great seating, our kids loved the space to be free and the stream! We had been left a lovely welcome gift which was so appreciated. Great location to explore the Cape. We’ll come back if we can!

Bonnie and Mark's house is lovely. The location is quiet and peaceful, yet not far away from anything you need. The house is not large, but is well designed and doesn't feel small at all. Both Bonnie and Mark have done a great job of anticipating what their guests might need. We had a great visit to Cotuit!
A very comfortable and lovely place for a family of 4 and a small dog. Centrally located in a quiet neighborhood.
I enjoyed staying at Bonnie’s property. The house felt warm, cozy and welcoming.

We are so lucky to have stayed the weekend in this beautiful place. There was plenty to do close by, but the welcoming feel of this home made it hard to leave! The fully equipped kitchen made home cooked meals a breeze, the decor was fabulous, and the couch was so comfortable we were searching for a tag so we could buy the same one!! This place is perfect for a getaway, even during the off season! Highly recommend!

This cottage checks so many boxes. I am very familiar with area You are perfectly situated close to Mashpee and Hyannis. Great restaurant options, beaches and nature. You can’t ask for more. I can only envision how wonderful it is in the summer with the creek behind you! A true gem!

We loved this home! Absolutely spotless and so well appointed. Everything was as described and even better than the pictures.
We felt welcomed by Bonnie and Mark, who were always responsive. The house had everything we needed and more.
The area is great - plenty to explore, great restaurants, shopping and amazing beaches.
We would HIGHLY recommend Bonnie and Mark’s cape house for any season!
This home was exactly as described and was very comfortable for us. We would definitely stay there again if traveling to the same area.
This was our second time staying at Mark and Bonnie's place. The house always has everything we need and is very comfortable. Bonnie and Mark are quick to respond any time we have questions.

Truly a home away from home! Packed with all the supplies you would possibly need. Almost felt more like I was house sitting than staying at and Airbnb. Extremely comfortable furniture (most importantly beds!). Great location with lots to do within minutes from the house.

My family stayed at Mark and Bonnie’s Airbnb for Christmas and had a wonderful time! The house is lovely, complete with everything you need and more! They even put up a Christmas tree for us which was so nice. Bonnie was quick to respond which was greatly appreciated. The outdoor space is beautiful and we enjoyed our stay. The perfect cozy, comfortable getaway on the Cape!

The house was great - exceeded our expectations. It was wonderful that it was so dog friendly but the outstanding feature, besides the responsiveness and friendliness of our hosts, was the complete kitchen as we unexpectedly had to cook a great deal of the Thanksgiving feast we had with our family - including the turkey and a pumpkin cheesecake! Everything was warm and comfortable and well organized for cleaning up before we left. Definitely recommend!
A tiny little house that somehow manages to feel spacious inside! Nestled in a beautiful quiet neighborhood with a large wooded lot in the back. We are definitely interested in visiting again!

House was a gem! Space was beautifully decorated and well planned for privacy, comfort, and visiting. The outside area is perfect for peaceful reflection, entertaining, or family gathering. We were completely satisfied with all this property offered!
We were in town for a bike race so it was a short stay. We were right at home though and enjoyed the local area, the neighborhood, and the house.

We had an amazing stay! The property is in an excellent location, and beautifully appointed- every detail is thought out by Bonnie and Mark to ensure a great stay. Wonderful and responsive hosts! We thoroughly enjoyed the local hikes and communities. Our kids loved having the creek right alongside to explore, the entire family would love to come back again soon!
⁃ The H family (CA)

Stayed here in October 2023 to see around in Cape Cod area. We had a totally amazing experience here. The house is located in a beautiful area surrounded by woods. There is even a small creek that flows in the backyard. The house is furnished very tastefully. Everything was just perfect. We couldn’t have asked for anything better.
Bonnie’s place was perfect!
We LOVE This home! Everything was so clean and convenient. Beautiful space with a fabulous backyard. We will definitely book again.

Bonnie and Mark's place was perfect for our one year wedding anniversary trip to the Cape with our two dogs.
It was super clean and very comfortable, even the pooches felt right at home!
We lucked out with beautiful weather and were able to enjoy the back patio for breakfast, which was just as nice as the inside.
Although we went just the two of us we would definitely come back with friends as there were three bedrooms and plenty of space.
Great restaurants and beaches are in the area and plenty of local recommendations in the welcome booklet provided.
There was so much attention to detail, and we couldn't have felt more welcomed and comfortable.
We would absolutely recommend this house to anyone looking to stay in the area, we for sure will be back!
Bonnie was a great host! Super clean home and very responsive to all our questions.

The stay exceeded our expectations; we wish we had more time to enjoy what the home has to offer. The biggest negative common to all AirBnB rentals are the fees. We've found hotels now to offer more advantages with more flexibility on fees.

This cottage on Cape Cod is delightful: spacious, spotless, and perfect for our group of 4. The bedrooms were large with TVs and cozy, comfortable beds, with plenty of blankets and pillows in the closets if needed. The kitchen had everything we needed, with new appliances and enough dishes, glasses, and utensils to easily handle a large group. The living area was spacious for our group of four and was extended by a beautiful outdoor patio with plenty of seating as well as a gas grill. The house is located on a very quiet street and is bordered in the back by woods. Its central location on Cape Cod makes it easy to travel in any direction to get to PTown, Nantucket, or Martha's Vineyard. We highly recommend Bonnie's place in Cotuit--you will not be disappointed!

We loved the location and how clean the place was.
It was raining so we could not sit outside but we will be back and enjoy the backyard.

Cute, Clean & Cozy
We had a wonderful time here! The house was spotless and very comfortable. I especially enjoyed the deck and the backyard, which is beautifully lit at night. All the bedrooms have a big screen TV and a fan.
The house is in a quaint village area, centrally located. Very close to shops and restaurants, and also not far from the wharf and ferries to Martha’s Vineyard and Nantucket.
I highly recommend this property and I’m sure you will enjoy it as much as we did!
Great place in a beautiful location! It was our first time in Cotuit, and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay in their clean and comfortable home.

Bonnie and Mark were a pleasure to communicate with and their home is adorable! We loved everything about it and just wish the weather cooperated enough for us to enjoy the beautiful deck a little more! The town is an 8-min drive to Mashpee for Starbucks, grocery stores, and shopping, super close to Hyannis for the ferries and great dog-friendly restaurants, and lots of great beaches (including some dog-friendly spots) in local Cotuit and Barnstable. So many great recommendations from Bonnie and Mark, too. Will definitely want to come back next year.

We really enjoyed our stay. The house is situated in a residential area and Loop Beach is only 5 minutes away. The backyard is private so you can sit outside on the patio. Bonnie was gracious to leave parking pass to any nearby beaches and allowed use of their bikes.

Our stay at Bonnie's house was amazing, she went went above and beyond to make sure our family had a enjoyable stay! The house was clean top to bottom and the beds where comfortable. We enjoyed a nice meal on the back patio. Everything we needed was right at the house and exceeded our expectations.

Bonnet and Mark are super hosts ! We so enjoyed their beach house which was in a quiet neighborhood. The furnishings, the beds and linens were lovely. The living room, kitchen and deck were well
enjoyable . So much to do in the area .
As one who believes less is more… my husband and I are counting the days until next year at Bonnie’s place…top two of about 20 air B&B’s we have stayed at… simply the best …
Super place! Sparkling clean, well stocked and great location. Thanks for a great stay :)

Wonderful location in Cotuit. This house had everything we needed and Bonnie and Mark ensured that we felt at home. The experience was charming; the little attention to details were perfect. Highly recommended!
Our stay at Bonnie and Marks place was comfortable and relaxing. We appreciated all the extra amenities.
thank you Bonnie for a great stay. The house was in a quiet and beautiful location, and was extremely clean when we arrived.

Everything about our stay was wonderful. From check-in to check-out anything we needed was just a text message away with a very timely response. The house is so beautifully cozy with plenty of space for more than my wife, me and our pooch. We loved how private it felt and at the same time there was plenty of wonderful people in town. The way Bonnie and Mark made us feel welcome with the personal welcome basket was above and beyond. Thank you both for welcoming us and having us feel so invited in your beautiful home.
Charming, comfortable, well decorated, exceptionally clean and well appointed. A wooded and peaceful setting. The patio is lovely. A great place to vacation!

Cannot think of enough great things to say about my stay at Mark & Bonnie's home. The house is gorgeous and felt like home and had every amenity I could think of and more. The hosts are super kind and accommodating. By far my favorite Airbnb visit, I would book with Mark & Bonnie again in a heartbeat.

Absolute 5 star review! The photos don’t do this place justice for how peaceful the backyard is, how nicely done each touch is, and just how comfortable everything is. We had 6 adults and a dog and felt like there was plenty of room to both spread out and enjoy time together. Bonnie was very communicative leading up to our stay and provided a great list of recommended activities.
Bonnie’s place was clean and so well decorated. The beds were very comfortable too. Kitchen has everything you need. Overall an outstanding place to stay!

We absolutely loved staying here. Bonnie’s place is the way BNBs should be ran. It’s the little things like being fully stocked in the kitchen, having soft towels, using name brand soap, leaving a small welcome basket, extras like bug spray and such as well that set hosts like her apart.
Too many folks nickel and dime things and treat you like a dollar sign, but you will feel like family here.
The place itself is very roomy, private and peaceful. It’s in a fantastic location on a quiet road that is an easy drive to anywhere along the Cape.
We only wished we had stayed longer and had more time to enjoy our stay!
Thank you Bonnie for representing the best of hosts! We will be back anytime we come to MA.

My family and I returned to Bonnie and Mark’s home for a long weekend, and it was just as lovely as we remembered! The space is beautiful, with a very comfortable and cozy interior in addition to a great outdoor space that is very private. It’s located close to lots of great beaches, and we loved riding the bikes around Cotuit as well. Mark and Bonnie were very responsive and welcoming - they have truly thought of all the details to make their AirBnB feel like a home away from home. We can’t wait to come back!

We loved our time here! There's so many great parks and trails all either walking distance or a short drive. Hosts were very communicative about check-in and provided tons of activity/food recommendations as well as a thoughtful welcome basket. The cottage itself is very clean with a simple, beachy vibe (beds and couch very comfortable, too) in a quiet neighborhood. We would love to come back with our pups in the summer :)
Excellent place to unwind and relax. Will be coming back again and again!
We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful house. We with we could have stayed longer!

We loved the place , Bonnie and Mark were excellent hosts.
We would love to comeback during the summer
Lovely house in spectacular setting.

We had a wonderful time at this Airbnb. The house and property looks like the pictures and is extremely clean and well maintained. The location is very peaceful and surrounded by nature. The hosts left thoughtful treats and recommendations. We really appreciated we were able to bring our dog, who loved exploring in the backyard. We would definitely book this place again and recommend it to others.
The place was immaculate and well stocked with everything you could possibly need! We highly recommend this rental home away from home.

Bonnie and Mark have the cutest home that was perfect for our annual NYE friends’ weekend trip! The space was very nice and extremely comfortable, and had everything we needed. The hosts left a sweet note and welcome goodies and were very quick to respond to any questions we had. We loved it so much and would definitely stay here again (and in fact we were looking at the available summer dates)!
Thank you for a wonderful stay!

Bonnie & Mark were good communicators leading up to checkin! Everything was as described. The house was in a nice quiet neighborhood and everything was very clean. Super easy to checkin and checkout. We’d definitely stay here again if in the area!

Bonnie and Mark were superb hosts, they answered questions we had prior to our arrival and were very accommodating to my family’s needs. They left us a welcome basket and even something for our fur family member! The home was very clean and was beautifully decorated. We would definitely stay here again!
Thank You Bonnie and Mark. Your attention to detail providing everything you might need for a Thanksgiving dinner at Cape Cod. Lovely setting with a very homey vibe.

Beautiful home, beautiful location! The house is spotless and welcoming. The owners made check in super easy and convenient. So grateful that they allow pets. My kids and I love traveling with the dogs!
The house was very clean, easy check in, good location.

Mark and Bonnie’s home is beautiful. The house is stocked with everything you could think of needing during your stay. Their home is a little oasis which we wished we had more time to enjoy. I would highly recommend Mark and Bonnie’s home and would definitely stay again!

We were so pleased with our stay at this beautiful home! The owners have thought of everything, down to the lovely decor, super comfortable beds, gorgeous outdoor space, the stocking of every item imaginable that we could need (even firewood for the patio firepit), and some thoughtful snacks upon our arrival. They also communicated quickly and easily whenever we had a question. We will definitely look up this property again if we need a place to stay in Cape Cod!
We stayed for our wedding weekend and the house was perfect! Bonnie and Mark even left us a cute little wedding gift! Would definitely stay again! Thank you!
Perfect place for a quiet weekend getaway!
Very comfortable house that backs up to the woods and is very private. Bonnie and Mark were very responsive in answering any question we had. We would certainly recommend it to anyone.

We had a great stay at Mark and Bonnie's. The house is very comfortable and conveniently located close to town and some beautiful beaches. Check in was seamless as well. We would definitely stay here again when in Cape Cod!
Nice house and nice outdoor area. Accurate description.
Bonnie and Mark are some of the nicest and most accommodating people I have ever rented from. There house was also quite lovely. Thank you so much for a wonderful time.

Absolutely beautiful home and great location. Plenty of great breakfast/brunch places nearby to start the day (check out the recommendations by the hosts), but also well stocked kitchen if you're looking to cook. About 20-30min drive to ferry to Martha's Vineyard and Nantucket. Couldn't recommend this home more, my friends and I can't wait to go back soon!

My family and I came on a house hunting trip over a long weekend and arrived late at night Check in was extremely easy and we were greeted with a delicious basket of snacks and a magically lit backyard!! The house is comfortable and allows for easy commute around the cape. It has a great backyard for the days you just want to stay home and read a book while sitting in the back patio and enjoying the late summer breeze.
The house is clean and very comfortable. We had a lovely time.
Bonnie’s place was PERFECT, and she was so easy to communicate with.

Such a wonderful place! We had two adults, 2 kids, one Gramma, and a dog and the size of the home was perfect! They thought of everything from comfy bedding to every cooking utensil and bath towel you could ever need. Would certainly stay here again! Thank you to Bonnie & Mark!

Beautiful home, absolutely immaculate, full of lovely little details. The layout is comfy, the deck and grounds are beautiful cared for. We enjoyed every minute! Bonnie and Mark were easy to reach, highly recommend!
My family and I stayed at this home and it was awesome. Owners were very responsive and helpful. The house was cute, clean and well stocked. We would highly recommend!

An excellent find, whether you want to get out and explore, or just sit around with some coffee and scenery. Bonnie (and Mark) are fantastic, the house is as good as advertised, and the location is ideal for making the most of any Cape visit. Our group of 6 never felt cramped, and the beds were very comfortable. We would definitely stay here again!
Wonderful and cute cape cod escape! Look no further - this is the spot. Highly recommend!

GREAT place! Highly recommend. It was super comfortable for three adults, a toddler and our dog (also one of the comfiest beds at an Airbnb we’ve stayed at yet). Close to a lot (including a cape league team) but also a quiet place with ever amenity you need. Hopefully we’ll be back for another stay soon!

This was what we were looking for and more! Quiet, comfortable and relaxing atmosphere. Fully stocked home, modern amenities and responsive hosts. We enjoyed our time here and I would love to return for a girl's weekend with my friends. Thank you.

We loved this place in Cape Cod. The only issue was bugs but the host had a basket full of insect repellents and bracelets for kids which came super handy. We will stay again - for a family of 6 with teenage kids and a baby, we had all we needed and more for a short beach break. Thank you!

A lovely home in a lovely, quiet town on the upper Cape that's very easy to get to, avoiding much of the summer traffic that can be such a drag when going to towns further out. The home's layout is a little unusual...you enter at the bedroom level and the living room, kitchen, and access to the beautifully furnished deck are downstairs from there. Every room is newly renovated, well-appointed, and absolutely immaculate. The kitchen and family room are comfortable and lead out to the beautiful, private, and quiet deck. Prior to our arrival, Bonnie and Mark sent a link to a variety of things to do in the area and the highlight was Yoga on the Beach on Little Poppy Beach, which can be a little tricky to find but very much worth seeking out if you're there in the summer. But note that there's no parking where the group meets so you either need to be dropped off at the end of Wading Place Rd (see here on GoogleMaps: HGGR+HGP Mashpee, Massachusetts) or walk one mile from the parking lot at the Popponesset Marketplace, 259 Shore Dr, Mashpee. We also enjoyed using Bonnie and Mark's bikes (2 adult-sized, 2 kid-sized), especially because parking at town beaches is by permit only.

Cotuit Cottage was the perfect location for enjoying the Cape Cod Hydrangea Festival. The cottage is pleasantly decorated, clean, and the kitchen has everything you need. The patio and deck were perfect for morning coffee/breakfast as well as afternoon appetizers. Plenty of supplies for the beach including beach bag, towels, blankets, etc., and an outdoor shower. Great location for visiting all of the regions/villages of Cape Cod. I highly recommend Cotuit Cottage, and Mark and Bonnie were excellent hosts and great communicators.

We really enjoyed this rental - Bonnie and Mark provided anything you could need, great kitchen with spices too. Many thoughtful extras too - like cheese and cracker varieties and treats for the fur baby, even an outdoor lead for the dog! Everything in the home was in great working order, and very tastefully decorated. The outdoor space was great with big table, couch and chairs - loved all the solar lights that made the space look magical after dark. Would highly recommend this home!
Awesome house - has everything you need for a nice getaway

Great house for 4 adults and a small child. Very well equipped and owners responsive to all requests. Outside area in back is really the highlight. Lots of sitting area, shade, bbg, surrounded by quiet woods. Great location. Easy access to restaurants and beaches. A delight.

Our family stayed in Bonnie and Marks lovely home, had many enjoyable meals cooked in the well equipped kitchen, and spent family time together both indoor and outside on the deck. Bright and cheerful interior, clean and modern. Sweet offerings left in the fridge upon our arrival were greatly appreciated! We highly recommend this home.
We had a great stay at Bonnie’s house on Cape Cod. The house is in a great location, well appointed, clean and comfortable. We would certainly stay there again.

This cottage was perfect for our little family getaway. We were in a wedding down the street at Willowbend, and we were able to bring our in-laws, little ones, and dog down for the weekend. The cottage had the perfect layout with the bedrooms upstairs and the living space downstairs that opened up to a gorgeous patio. The kitchen was fully stocked with pots, pans, glasses, plates, you name it! It made it very easy for us to travel as a family. The house was very clean—you would never know it was pet friendly. We are so glad we spent our weekend here, and we will be sure to recommend this rental to anyone heading down to the area! Thanks again for having us, Bonnie & Mark!
The home is amazing! Perfect for a family. It is decorated so well, clean and the kitchen is stocked with everything you’d need. The location is so nice, we’ll definitely be back.

Bonnie’s house is perfect & truly feels like a home. Well decorated, incredibly well stocked with kitchen items, cleaning supplies, all the linens you could want, this place truly lets you just bring your clothes & toiletries & not worry about the rest. Over a 3 month stay I cooked & baked pretty extensively & the kitchen had everything I could ask for. It’s a quiet neighborhood, great for dog walks & bird watching. Beautiful back deck with a nice grill, great lounge chairs, the works. Would be an amazing spot for a quick getaway, or longer term stays. Bonnie was great with communication & couldn’t have been a better host. Thanks again :)

Bonnie and Marks place was a dream come true. The place was even better than expected. The hosts were great at communicating if we needed anything, which we really didn’t because everything was provided. The home and property are beautiful and look brand new. The bedrooms and bathrooms were spacious and the living room was very comfortable and relaxing and there’s a real wood burning fireplace too. Perfect charm! Kitchen had everything we needed and then some. The host even left us a little cheeseboard in the fridge with some cheese samples. On the counter was a basket with a local book, some crackers and snacks as well as some treats for the dogs. Very thoughtful touches. The beds and bedding were some of the most comfortable I’ve ever slept on.
The property is private but also not far to drive to get some groceries or other shopping done. It took us about 40 min to drive out to cape cod national seashore area. I’m assuming bc it was the off-season, traffic wasn’t too bad. The area is beautiful. This was definitely one of my favorite Airbnb stays! Highly recommend.

My Husband, our 2 sons and I had a great Christmas at Bonnie and Mark’s home. The home is incredible, the decor in the entire house is very beautiful. The place was very clean and had all of the necessities for our stay. The bedrooms are big with huge closet space, the beds and pillows are extremely comfortable. The living room (were we spent most our time) is very beautiful, spacious and very comfortable. We were able to spent quality time together watching movies and playing board games. The kitchen was well equipped and had everything we needed. This was by far our best Christmas getaway.
Overall, Bonnie and Mark are great hosts who thought of every little detail and made us feel welcome.
Mark and Bonnie were great hosts, would gladly stay here again! The house was very well set up and the beds were dreamy!
Great roomy accommodations in a quiet setting. Clean, and great for an extended family. Kick back and relax.

Bonnie and Mark's Cotuit house was exactly as shown and described on the listing. They are super nice, helpful, and responsive. The spaces are tastefully decorated and comfortable. The back/outdoor space is surrounded by trees and so peaceful. I needed a break from my home in the city where I've been working since the pandemic. Bonnie and Mark were also very accommodating in letting me bring my old well-behaved cat. I totally felt at home. I also hosted Thanksgiving there and Bonnie even got me all the tools to roast a turkey! Mark brought me a computer monitor to make my "work from their home" more comfortable. They are such great hosts and I would definitely recommend their home. Thanks Bonnie and Mark!

I had a wonderful stay at Bonnie's Cotuit Cottage. It is exactly as advertised. Clean, quiet. I enjoy cooking and the kitchen had all one needs to prepare meals. Communication was easy. I would stay here again and can highly recommend.

Bonnie, thanks for sharing your lovely home with us. You provided everything we needed and included some extra special touches. Wish we had more time to relax on your deck & enjoy the fire pit. The weekend went by too quickly. We’ll definitely return. Cape Cod is beautiful! Thanks again for the terrific hospitality!

Beautiful home in such a charming neighborhood in the Cape! Bonnie & Mark were wonderful hosts, extremely responsive and welcoming. The space was very clean and also dog friendly, it was the perfect place for our family to get away for the weekend. Would love to come back again!

Wonderful stay at this beautiful airbnb! Very quiet neighborhood location with wonderfully private deck/outdoor space. House was spotless and very comfortable, and Bonnie has really thought of everything in terms of amenities! Easy drive to local beaches. Hope to be back!

We loved staying at Bonnie and Mark's home. What a great location, the house is in such a peaceful setting, so quiet and private. The house has everything you could possibly need or want. There was a lovely basket of snacks left for us and cheese and crackers, very thoughtful. Great patio with beautiful furniture/umbrella for enjoying the outdoors. Also just a quick ride to the grocery store or places where you can pick up food/drinks. We love the location as we were just a quick ride away from Falmouth, Chatham, Hyannis - we just wish we had more time! Thank you again for such great hospitality!

The house is so beautiful and every detail was thought of. It is very clean and decorated really nice. Feels like a home and not a rental. The beds were comfortable. We didn't get a chance to utilize all of the amenities and wish we had more time. *FYI there are stairs. I don't remember reading anything about that but it is good to know. Didn't pose a problem just giving a heads up. Bonnie thought about everything. A little goodies to tide us over until we could get to the store and an incredible book with all information and activities in the area. She responded incredibly quickly to any of our questions. We would stay there again if we were in the area.

My family's stay at Bonnie and Mark's place was fantastic. The house is immaculate! And, so many nice touches...they really have thought of everything you need to be comfortable and feel welcomed. They were also incredibly responsive along the way, answering all of our various questions within minutes. The house is very convenient to all the points of interest in Cotuit and throughout Cape Cod. We would love to stay there again in the future!

Beautiful, comfortable, cozy home. Bonnie and Mark made sure our stay was enjoyable and relaxing by adding special touches. Perfect location, close to the beach and Martha’s Vineyard. Would absolutely recommend their home for a family vacation

Bonnie was such a great host, she included lots of thoughtful extras with the house…towels, sunscreen, s’mores supplies, restaurant suggestions, and more! The house with very clean and inviting…the back porch and yard were so peaceful. Many quaint towns are close by as well as lovely beaches. We would definitely stay there again!

This place was truly lovely! Bonnie and Mark's place was spacious and immaculately clean. The back porch was so private and gorgeous, and the neighborhood was quiet and peaceful. We LOVED having the bikes there to cruise around the neighborhood and to the beach close by! Their book of recommendations was also extremely helpful and spot on, they did not steer us wrong (especially Polar Cave ice cream, YUM). I would love to come back next Summer and stay here again; it was the perfect getaway for my boyfriend, dog, and I!

Mark and Bonnie are terrific hosts, quick to respond and extremely hospitable. They have a beautiful property and have set it up nicely with everything you need. And their house is located in a quiet and friendly neighborhood but with few mins driving you get to Stop and Shop, Walgreen and other stores, restaurants. We also stayed in their nice patio to have outdoor BBQ. We loved our time here!

This was, by far, the best Airbnb we have ever stayed at. We were worried it wouldn’t live up to the photos, but it certainly did. Everything in this home is beautiful, clean, comfortable, and brand new. The yard and outdoor space were also immaculate. (We had a great time doing s’mores in the fire pit one night!)
We brought our toddler and two medium-sized dogs with us, and the space was great for them as well. We have found a lot of Airbnb’s claim they’re dog-friendly, but then have lots of rules that actually make bringing your pets along very difficult. This was NOT the case with Bonnie and Mark’s house, and we truly appreciated that our dogs were allowed to be comfortable!
We walked around the neighborhood everyday — it was very quiet (during the day and at night) and everyone we passed was extremely
friendly!
We also walked down to the Cotuit Kettleers’ field for a ballgame one night, and went on runs. There were some beaches within walking distance, but unfortunately you need a residence pass for those. If we didn’t have all the beach gear needed for a toddler, we would have taken Bonnie and Mark’s beach cruisers to the beach or walked the short distance. Instead, we opted to drive 25min to a nearby beach with public parking.
The kitchen was fully stocked with everything you could possibly need. Even the dishes matched the decor and felt welcoming!
The only “con” we can think of is that the twin bedroom has very thin curtains. We initially planned to put our toddler in that room, but decided we wanted to sleep beyond sunrise on vacation :) Instead, he slept in a full bed in a room with light blocking curtains. If you’re a parent and need all the bedrooms in the house to accommodate your kids, we suggest bringing some of the travel light blocking curtains you can find on Amazon. Other than that, there’s absolutely nothing negative we could possibly think of!
Overall, we rate this a 10/10 and will absolutely suggest it to our friends and family! Bonnie and Mark have clearly put a lot of time and energy into their Cotuit home — we repeatedly found ourselves commenting on how no detail was overlooked or unthought of.

We loved our time at Bonnie and Mark’s place. The house was truly a family-friendly environment. Bedrooms are spacious and provided comfy bedding. The outdoor space is perfect for barbecuing or if you’re just looking to lay back and relax. Cute and quiet neighborhood with a amazing spots to watch the sunrise, hike, or go kayaking. House is equipped with literally everything you can imagine. We are already planning on coming back here next summer! Thanks again Bonnie and Mark
Great new location, house and host. Book early as this will become popular.

Bonnie’s cottage is the perfect place to stay for a getaway! We appreciated the attention to all of the details - Bonnie has literally thought of everything which makes it so easy to sit down and relax once you arrive. Her suggestions and recommendations for the area are so helpful and made us feel as though we were staying at a friend’s place 😊.

Bonnie and Mark’s house is a great place for families. It was on a quiet dead end street and we felt very safe at night leaving the windows open. The home was clean and cozy and they thought of just about everything to make our stay enjoyable and comfortable. They went above and beyond and left a special treat for my sons birthday and for my dog. The beds were very comfortable and soft, and the linens smelled better than any other place I’ve stayed. The kitchen was fully equipped with everything you could think of to cook a family meal. The out door deck was beautiful and the landscape nicely maintained. The back yard was perfect for our dog to roam and they even had a brook that was so peaceful to watch and listen to. I would highly recommend Bonnie and Mark’s home.
the best host 😁
Highest regards, house was clean, the owner was flexible, the amenities were appreciated, and overall it was a good experience for all.
Great location, fairly priced, very clean, lot of room, comfortable house.
I love this place great place to stay in

Great place to stay! We had the place to ourselves but may need to double check if it's the entire home or shared space. Definitely enjoyed having the house to spend time relaxing and everything was great! Clean, cute decorations, and everything you need for a vacation stay was at the house. Thank you, Julie!
Great time on the cape, the place was clean and had plenty of space

Another great stay, and we'll be back. Jennifer's communication is particularly good. Need something? On it. And you won't need much, because the place is fitted for everything -- including cooking for Thanksgiving!

The only issues we had were pulling in and out of the very steep driveway and for my mother, who has mobility issues, to negotiate the unusually large step at the front door. Other than that everything else was fine and as described.

The house was a very comfortable space. It was very clean and nicely decorated. The kitchen had everything we needed for light meal prep. Jennifer was very accommodating in every way. It was a very enjoyable visit.

Nice few days in Cape Cod. Great location right in the middle of Cape Cod with easy access to beaches, towns, restaurants etc. House has everything you need and was updated as described (eg new paint, interior design, some new appliances etc. with bathrooms on the older side). Worked for us, as we didn‘t spend much time in the house. Jennifer is a great and very responsive host and everything worked out as expected.

A great house to stay within a great part of Cape Cod - lots of good food and activities for the kids near this house that’s perfectly setup for adults and kids. The basement playroom was perfect for the kids!

Wonderful house with enough space, good beds and further amenities. Everything was very clean. The house seems to be recently refurbished and is nicely decorated. We had a lot of fun with the foosball table.

Great location and lots of space for our multigenerational family vacation (ages 25-85). Appreciated having some kitchen staples on hand, like flour, as we had forgotten to pack a ziplock portion for the trip. Enjoyed sitting on the back deck sipping coffee in the morning watching the bunnies scamper around. The AC works great! Jennifer was very responsive.
While there are two rooms with two twin beds each, none of these mattresses are supported by box springs but rather lie straight on wooden slats. For an elderly person, this was not comfortable. For a younger person, it would be fine.
While a cleaning fee is assessed, just prior to arrival was told we would have to launder all sheets and towels. It would have been nice to be told this prior to booking.

The house was easy to get to and check in was easy with a door code. The house was beautiful and spacious. There were 6 females that stayed and we didn’t feel like we were bumping into each other. The house was clean and had pretty much everything we needed. The back deck was perfect for morning coffee! My only suggestion would be to have some additional hand towels for the bathrooms. Jennifer was quick to respond to questions and messages. Overall a great place and great time!
Great place

We had a wonderful stay at Jennifer's place in Osterville. The house was spacious and comfortable, with all the beds, cozy spots, and necessities that our family of 5 needed. Jennifer went out of her way to check in with us, made sure we had everything we needed, and answered our questions before and during our stay. We had a terrific Cape Cod vacation, with easy access from the house to all that the Cape has to offer, from beaches to bike riding to whale watching and more. Would love to return!

We had such a lovely stay in Barnstable at this beautiful home. The space was perfect and so comfortable for our family of 5 to spread out and we loved having the living room and kitchen spaces to spend time together. The kitchen was well-stocked and we had everything we needed to make some meals with the local seafood. The foosball table was a definite plus for everyone. We had a fairly short drive to Craigsville beach which we enjoyed and were not far from Hyannis to the ferry for a daytrip to Nantucket. Our fave spot was Four Seas ice cream which was super close and so friendly - the ice cream was delicious and perfect for a summer day. Staying here was the perfect, relaxing end to our tour of New England!

Very appreciative of Jennifer's communication. Great space with nice location. Minimal amenities provided (soap, shampoo, etc), so make sure you bring your own things, but nothing that detracted from the enjoyment of the stay.

Good communication was the first sign we'd have a good experience. It was confirmed when we arrived to find a really lovely well-appointed, modern house. You can be confident of a good experience staying at Jennifer's place. Thanks!

Thanks for a great Cape stay! This spacious home was plenty of room for our family of six and the bonus bed in the lower level was a pleasant surprise. With three generations traveling together, having a little extra room to spread out was appreciated. The kitchen had everything we needed and the outdoor space was perfect for enjoying the great fall weather. We really loved having a table in the eating area where we could all sit and enjoy a casual dinner or for breakfast before we went out exploring the many Cape sites.
Jennifer was super responsive with messages regarding check in details as well as any questions during our stay. The home was clean, spacious and beyond our expectations. Would highly recommend!

We had a fantastic stay at Jennifer’s place. The location was in such a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. The house was very comfortable and inviting, we felt at home immediately. Craigville Beach was just moments away, which was awesome! It was centrally located to almost everything we wanted to do while in town. We would highly recommend this location!

Overall, we enjoyed our stay. The place is specious, on a very quiet street, has a lot of privacy, and has a well-equipped and clean kitchen. The host was also very nice--she responded fast to our messages, let us use her Netflix account, and let us check in early. There are two things that could be improved: (1) the AC units are pretty old, noisy, lack temperature sensors and (2) the bed in the master bedroom was too soft for people with back issues.

Our stay at Jennifer’s Osterville Ranch was perfect for our family of five. As advertised, the house was Clean, Bright and Spacious and also perfectly located for our bucket list of Cape Cod fun. Even the neighbors were helpful when our minivan broke down out front !
Jennifer’s communication with us throughout our booking and stay was timely and appreciated. We are already looking forward to renting again next summer!
nice house, with all équipements. clean and quiet

Had a great stay for a week around a wedding weekend. Jennifer was great and quick to answer questions. Loved that the rental was available Wed to Wed, gave us a whole weekend and avoided some of the weekend traffic

Was a really nice, modern house but also felt homey. The basement was nicely set up with foosball and another bed! Had everything we needed and it was in a peaceful, pretty area with a short drive to town. Perfect place for our visit in Cape Cod!
Jennifer’s place was great— it was close to beaches and cute towns, and we had a wonderful trip!

great house! location was good... about 25 minutes from awesome beaches. street is quiet... neighborhood made it nice to let the kids go on bike rides. the house itself was spacious and adequate for a large family. the kitchen was very well supplied, much appreciated that they were Tupperware containers for the duration of our stay! definitely a great find!

Jennifer was a great host. she was very communicative, and our check-in and out were seem less. The place is fantastic and a perfect central location for the Cape. Comfortable beds, safe neighborhood, and beautiful house.

Jennifer’s house was perfect for our family get together! Quiet neighborhood, the beds were comfy, the boys loved the foos ball table, the fresh seafood shop was fabulous, we were close to everything we needed!

We'd loved our stay at Jennifer's place. It was very comfortable for our family of five. The neighborhood was nice and close to lots of things. The kitchen had a good amount of amenities. We appreciated that she had some beach items in the garage that we could use (chairs, mats, umbrella and a cooler). Jennifer was very good about communicating with us and making sure everything was ok. I just wish we could've stayed longer. I highly recommend this place!

Wow.
This is truly a gem on AirB&B. The photos don’t do this property justice. Walking in, upon first impression, you’re like “Wow, this is way better than the photos could even show us!”
Drinks on the deck… a 5-star quality King size bed… a kitchen with everything you need…. All of our dinners were “to-go” style so we could enjoy all our meals in the more intimate setting of the private back porch.
And the location is literally perfect. Quick trips into any town you want on the Cape…. Easy access from Boston all the way to P-Town. I’d be hard pressed to rent from anyone again for a Cape vacation.
And as a transgender woman, having a host that was loving, accepting, and willing to open their home to me and my family made the vacation even more special for us.
Jennifer, our host, was an amazing communicator via AirB&B chat and was easily to get a hold of for any one-off questions.
Thank you Jennifer for hosting the best vacation of our lives!

Perfectly clean, great little space, just what we were looking for!

Cute as a button! Really, this place is perfect. There’s no wasted space, and yet the place feels clean and airy and comfortable. you will expect very polite hosts as well as a cleanly place to stay
Clean, cozy, beautiful

The place is great, photos don’t show what the place really is, perfect location (inside the woods but close walking distance from restaurants and bars), very clean, very cozy, full of details, it included extra things like chips, cereal, milk, coffee, tea, wine glasses and more... I loved the place, I really recommend it and I would stay there again for sure! Oh! They got amazing Halloween decoration!
Great place. Convenient location and very quick response
Wonderful host, cute and cozy place!

If you have trouble with stairs come prepared to handle 2 flights up to the loft...plenty of hand rails.

The private loft was very clean, private and quiet. Downtown shops and restaurants were a short distance away. Appreciated the great location on the Cape and the hospitable host. Would definitely return to this lovely place in the woods.
Lovely place to stay, very quiet surrounding and a very comfortable bed. Nice little details of Marlene make you feel comfortable and welcome.
What a wonderful gem in the woods near Hyannis. Highly recommended for a couple looking for a quiet getaway...yet surprisingly close to town.

A great locale, close to Main Street , the Harbor and beaches but tucked away in a private setting. Sitting on the balcony is like being in a tree-house as you are amidst branches and bird's nests. The loft was clean with many nice touches, snacks, toiletries, and large screen TV, for instance. A very comfortable stay!
The loft was fantastic! The loft was bright and airy, plenty of room for one or two people. The host was very gracious she was super easy to contact and most accommodating.

Great little place, very well stocked with cute touches and thoughtful essentials. Breakfast and coffee, milk, cream and sugar... this spot was awesome, relaxing and well cared for. Overall great experience and value!

Marlene is an excellent host. She’s very responsive and highly accommodating. I was able to bring along my dog which was also an added bonus. Close to the beach, town and entertainment!
Great place, would stay here again in a heartbeat.
The property was adorable and the goats were so cute! A little oasis close to Main Street Hyannis
Our second time at Marlene’s place. Everything is great as always. The space is beautiful and confortable. One of my best AirBnB experiences to date.

Not much to say besides the pictures don't do it justice. Right at the end of a dead end road, away from the traffic and lights, but close enough to be convenient (especially for the music tent). Well thought out amenities and the little touches really set this place apart.
Marlene’s place was just what we needed. All the extra thoughtful touches were great- great snacks and lots of information for things to do in the area!
Great place, comfortable, clean, great amenities, and quiet. Would recommend this spot highly.

Wonderful, really better than picture
The loft is amazing nested in a quite place minutes walk to Main street

A very comfortable, clean, lovely little loft. Exactly as described and the hosts were wonderful - responsive and thoughtful! I'd go back any time.
Cute clean loft nestled in a beautiful wooded area. Very peaceful.

My husband, young son, and I stayed at the loft for a long weekend at the Cape. It was perfect! The space was super clean and well-stocked. The shower was amazing! My wife and I stayed a single night at the Loft, and I can say that Marlene sets the bar for hospitality with attention to every detail. Coffee, tea, water and some light breakfast items were set out for us. The loft was private and comfortable, decorated on theme with the area.
If we are ever back in the area, we will definitely try to stay with Marlene again!
Beautiful property! Lovely place!

The place was great. Very close to downtown and the beaches, yet it sat back in the woods and made you feel as though you were out in the country.
The loft was larger than the photos suggested. Perfect size for our small family.

Marlene’s home is a special place. Located on a nature habitat it was nestled in a private space surrounded by gardens. The amenities were abundant and thoughtful making for a very welcoming atmosphere. The home is located a very short walk away from the Melody Tent in Hyannis where the concerts are spectacular. We look forward to returning!

This space was perfect for the two of us. We were visiting Hyannis to see a concert at the Melody Tent and we could walk right down the street to it. The space is private, clean and very comfortable. Marlene thought of everything including milk in the little fridge ( which also has a nice freezer space), cereal, wine glasses, tea, coffee and even a reusable shopping bag! The grounds were fun to explore with 2 adorable goats and 2 chickens. Many sitting spaces on the grounds and nestled in the gardens. We may look for another concert to attend so we can return. Thanks!!
Really lovely little spot and a great location as a jump off point for exploring Cape Cod. Will surely head back next time we are in the area.
Beautiful location and a wonderful host. Marlene went above and beyond, we loved our stay and would definitely return in the future.

The studio is plenty big for a couple and possibly one child. Marlene was accommodating when we had to shift plans and bring our son. Check in was a breeze. The loft was

The home is definitely private and off the main drag. We liked that. Goats are our favorite and to say hi to them daily was a treat.
Marlene is a great communicator and quick to answer questions.

As described by previous guests. Space itself, I might give 4 stars, for tiny little things here and there but everything packaged together was definitely a 5. Privacy was aplenty. Host was very unintrusive. It certainly felt like our own place, which for us was exactly what we were looking for.
The Loft was wonderful! It was the perfect location for the wedding my wife and I attended in Hyannis!

This is a beautiful loft space with a nice kitchen nook and a great shower. Very clean space with a nice front yard with lots of cool little statues. We only stayed one night and didn’t get to meet Marlene but if in the area, will definitely come again.

Had a lovely time!
Never been to the cape before and stayed here. Absolutely amazing place, would definitely go back. So clean, cozy and perfect location
Marlene was an amazing host! The loft had everything we needed and was very comfortable and nicely decorated.

Marlene’s place is at the end of a street just off the main business district of Hyannis. She provides all the amenities you could ask for and the apartment is very comfortable. We would not hesitate to stay there again if we are fortunate enough to return to the Cape.
This place was amazing! We wanted to move in. They were very considerate hosts and had many special touches. It is a beautiful property and within walking distance to town.

Great space. The place was spotless, there were snacks for walks and breakfast cereals - even little cartons of milk for us. There was also a folder with guides and recommendations for things to do in the area. I wish we were able to stay longer!
Marlene was a fantastic host!
I highly recommend this Airbnb. It was very nice to find a such a nice dog friendly place in such a great location. Very peaceful and wonderful hosts. They made our stay enjoyable.

Marlene’s place was so lovely and much more than we could have expected. There were lots of thoughtful touches and everything was catered for and more! We only stayed for the night but immediately wished we’d booked for longer. Would definitely recommend staying here

Easily the best Airbnb I've stayed at yet! The space was so beautiful and had tons of little touches and cute items. We loved the coffee and cereal as well as the snacks. Perfect place!!! Loved all the thoughtful touches

Marlene’s loft was clean and lovely. Marlene is very friendly and a perfect host!

5 stars and then some! We had such a great experience staying at this loft retreat.
