I can't wait to stay here again! Such a gem in an amazing location! One regret was not making plans to go to the Melody Tent because it's so close and a cool spot! West End (a hip dinner/ bar location) is also walking distance! This was the perfect location for a couple and a pup!

This a cute little loft that is perfect for a quick getaway. We saw the baby goats on our last day and it was the best moment of my life. Great location near lots of Hyannis attractions and restaurants.

Great little loft which felt very private away from the main home. The loft was very clean and well equipped with snacks and breakfast cereals as well as being conveniently located a short walk from Hyannis Main Street.

Excellent location within walking distance of downtown Hyannis. Gorgeous, tranquil property and excellent, very responsive hosts! Cannot recommend this place enough - thank you!

Super convenient location! The gardens on the property are beautiful, and the loft felt very private. You can hear the concerts at the Melody Tent since it's right across the street! Thanks for a wonderful stay.

Marlene’s place is in a great location, about a 5-10 minute walk from anywhere on Main Street. The loft had great amenities such as snacks, breakfast cereals and also some water bottles etc.
Overall Marlene’s place had a big impact on the stay in Hyannis.

It is in the midst of a lot of greenery so you truly feel like you are on vacation. There are a lot of great personal touches - water bottles, chips, milk and cereal. This loft is a lovely private getaway that is conveniently located close to Main St Hyannis...and other attractions. The room is very comfortable with every thing you could need. Will come back again!
Lovely comfortable well-appointed studio loft. Great shower and bed. Very clean and Marlene is excellent at communicating.
Off road, quiet, separate from the house, sweet place with nice touches. We were very comfortable and close to town. Marlene was easy to communicate with too.
Marlene was great. We brought our small dog. The place was exactly what we needed for a weekend trip.

Marlene's loft was so charming, clean, and beautiful. She was such a thoughtful host, too -- we had plenty of clean towels, a keurig coffee machine with capsules, and a super cute yet effective space heater. Her place also has a small outdoor deck with two chairs and a lovely view of trees.
We had a wonderful time staying there and liked how it was an easy commute to both Provincetown and other beaches along cape cod.

Need to drive to Main Street.
Halloween decor is awesome!

So appreciated attention to detail and touches of comfort like the extra padded floor, fresh towels on day two, and total ease of check in. I'll never stay in a hotel in Hyannis again. Dibs on this spot! Highly recommend.

Great room and amazing location!

Beautiful little Cape Cod apartment!
Had a great stay. She went above and beyond with the little food items she had and the quick responses to any issues or questions. It was also very dog friendly which was great.

This is a nice neat place. The owner is very thoughtful providing almost everything a traveler will need. Quite, private and comfortable. It close to downtown Hyannis, very convenient. Will come back again.

Great place. Would've been even better with a car.

Marlene was a great host and very accommodating! The space was great very close to downtown but so quiet and peaceful. She left us snacks, waters and coffee. Could not have asked for a better host and the place was perfect for us!

DARLING loft...

The loft was better than I ever anticipated. I was impressed with the level of comfort and cleanliness. The snacks provided really added a personal touch. This was so much better than a hotel! I would love to stay here again! -Jon

Great find, very happy!

Clean, idyllic, close but not too close to everything, and our hosts were gracious and warm. I almost don't want to write a review because I want to keep this gem to myself. But this deserves all the accolades. We can't wait to go back.

We highly recommend staying at Marlene's loft. It was so clean and comfortable. It was also in walking distance to our favorite places in town which made it very convenient. We are already planning our next trip!

Marlene's place was just as advertised. It was very clean and comfortable. We arrived late as we had an evening wedding and Marlene was so gracious and left the lights on for us. She was only a text or call away which was great. We definitely recommend staying here!!!👍👍👍

Calling this a "retreat" is spot on. Marlene gave us a warm welcome, and we quickly settled in to the beautiful corner of Cape Cod she's created. The restaurants and harbor of Hyannis are right around the corner when you're ready to explore. Highly recommended!

Really enjoyed my stay at Marlene's loft. Great location that is close to all the fun stuff in the area but still manages to feel secluded and private. The loft looks even better in real life than it does in the pictures. Everything was really clean, there were some snacks out for us, and it just felt super nice and cozy. Good vibes all around. Definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in the Hyannis area, especially couples and solo travelers.

This was our second time staying here and we loved it! Quiet, peaceful, very clean and plenty of space for yourself because it is a loft apartment above a detached garage. It was a nice relaxing place to come home to after a day at the beach. Also within walking distance to downtown Hyannis shopping and restaurants, so the best of both worlds!

Marlene was an excellent host. The room was clean and comfortable. She had snacks and coffee waiting for us in the room. The location was peaceful and secluded yet still walkable to restaurants in downtown Hyannis. We loved it!
Very clean and wonderful location to downtown. Very quiet and peaceful. Would recommend to any couple going for a nice vacation!
Marlene provided everything we needed to make our stay so comfortable. Would definitely rent again, and recommend!

Marlene's place is great! very clean and private. She also provided us with a bunch of snacks ,juices and coffee which was a nice touch. Everything you need is just a short drive away. We had such a great time there and will definitely be back to her place again! Thank you :)

Beautiful loft!
Located on country grounds in town. Cleanliness assured and maintained during our stay!
Service ***** *! Minutes to downtown and the ferry.
Perfect welcome! Don't hesitate, quality / price is great .

This space is phenomenal! The posting completely undersells it. The loft is above a detached garage, and it is a pristinely kept space with a very private entrance at the end of a very quiet dead-end street. Located less than a half mile from the restaurants in the heart of Hyannis, the location is truly the best of both worlds. Marlene responded almost immediately to my inquiries. When I arrived and found there were snacks and suggestions for dinner and a well-kept, tidy room I knew that this was one of the best bargains on the cape. Would recommend 100%.
Such an adorable little loft perfect for a couple visiting the beach! Close to shops and restaurants, and a short drive for activities in Yarmouth! Would definitely stay here again!

We had a great stay at the loft this week! The property is so beautiful and on quiet street not too far from downtown. Looks like a hot new restaurant opened up at the main corner in walking distance but we didn't make it. Marlene left the doors unlocked for us and we let ourselves in. The loft is a great size for a couple and the bed was comfy. I loved hearing the chickens in the morning and noticed a few goats and even a bunny running around. Loved the snacks she left for us like cereal, granola bar and even milk and apples.

The place looked adorable from the pictures, and was even better in person. There were instructions for a lockbox, but when we arrived we ran into the host, who had just unlocked the loft for us. The place itself is adorable -- a great back porch, little kitchenette and SUPER comfortable bed -- but even better was the location. It was less than a mile to downtown, so we could leave our car and explore on foot, too. The kitchen had basic silverware, plates, a fridge and a microwave. We made our own breakfasts and packed lunches there no problem. We were also restocked with water and some other goodies (apples, granola bars, juice, cereal) each morning, which was a nice touch. There was nothing at the Melody Tent while we were in town but it would be a great place to stay if you were catching a show there. The property itself is charming. We were greeted by a rooster each morning, and could see a goat on property too. We also got the chance to meet two adorable dogs! Would absolutely stay here again.

It is close to the beaches, very close to main street. Be ready to get up early with the rosters.
Clean and comfortable.
We absolutely loved this place! So close to the melody tent and walkable to the downtown. Marlene was a great host. We would love to come back!
Marlene's place is great. Great location, very clean. As advertised, would rent again

Marlene was a great host for my parents who were staying at this loft. It definitely feels like your in the country, but close to everything. You might hear a rooster early, so just one thing to be aware of but a great place overall.

Beautiful spot on the Cape! Marlene and family were great hosts. Easy to communicate and very dog friendly. The studio has all the necessities and is quite spacious. Highly recommend!

This is a MUST!!!! BOOK it NOW!!!Was blown away at how perfect the Loft was!!! (bigger than the pic show) Marlene n Maureen were there the greet you. U felt like u were staying w/old friends. Marlene's place is absolutely wonderful. Nice and secluded on a very nice piece of property. The apartment has everything you need, is very clean, and overall very enjoyable. We would happily stay there again in the future.

The a/c was a little noisy when it turned off and on but otherwise it was cool and enjoyable. Thank you, we enjoyed our stay!
Outstanding. A sanctuary just off the main drag, especially great to walk to a show at the Melody Tent. Was well appointed, clean, convenient and charming.
Marlene's loft was perfect for 2 of us. It was clear that they had put a lot of work into renovating the space above the garage and making it a fantastic, cozy place to stay.
